1b1('bum): mas tsam rnams bla mong byang chub slong
2a1('bum): yum 'di na la gso'i mthun 'gyur mdzad mkhan// zhabs drang che bstan gyis dbu mdzad// dbu sre dge slong mgon po dang // shAkya'i dge slong tshe rings gsum
2a2('bum): dmar lnga ba de'i bka' dros dam pa'i chos la legs mdzad nas/ rgyu ma'i nor la snying po blangs phyir bzhengs 'di ba zhengs dge ba'i bsod nams kyi sku tshe'i rgyal mnan bas
3b1('bum): 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs pa la dge
4a1('bum): lnga stong tsam gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gaN+DIg su
4a2('bum): thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag zad pa/ nyon mongs pargyu
4a3('bum): du gyurd pa sems shin tu rnam par gol ba shes rab shi
4a4('bum): grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang de chen po/ bya ba byas ba
4b1('bum): byas pa khur bo ra ba/ bdag gi don rab tu thob par cha srid phar
4b2('bum): sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyind pa'i mchog thob / kl-i sngags
5a1('bum): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o// dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang / skye dgu'i bdag mo la stsogs
5a2('bum): balnga brgya tsam dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang ba kun kyang chos stod pa sha stag dang
5a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chang ma ga myed kun
5a4('bum): rlob tu 'o ting nge 'dzin de rab tu tho pa/ stong pa nyid kyis med
5a5('bum): spyod yul can/ rtog pa myed pa'i spyod lam dang / ldan pa chos
5b1('bum): tshul khong du chud pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par brtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ni rnams
5b2('bum): 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ le lo myed cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa lus dang sog lnga myi lte po tshul 'chos
5b3('bum): pa myed pa/ kha gsag myed pa gags pa dang / khe dang / bkur sti'i sems medachung zing myed pa'i
5b4('bum): chos stond pa/ chos zong mo'i bzod pa dam pa gtogs par khong du chud pa/ myi 'jigs pa moni myo / yid long
6a1('bum): su zhum pa myed pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa thams cad rgyun chad pa/ las dang
6a2('bum): nyon mongs pa dang / phyir rgol ba rab tu bcom pa/ pha rolang po'i rgol ba thams cad kyis zil kyis myi ni rkyen thos dang / rang sangs
6a3('bum): rgyas thams cad kyis gtogs par dka' ba/ chos rab tu gtogs pa rnam par 'byed cing bston pang/ bskal pa
6a4('bum): grangs myed pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsa mas pa bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/ thog mnusaner myed pa de snyan
6a5('bum): la 'i tshig deng ldan pa/ bskal pa m+bu sa pa/ roladu tshigs su pa'i
6a6('bum): spobs myi chod pa/ 'khor mtha' yas pa zild kyis gnond pa/ myi 'jigs pa dang ldan pa
6b1('bum): pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba la mkhas pa chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / chu zla dang / rmi lam dang / sgra brnyan dang / gr-i yor dang
6b2('bum): nam mkha' dang / dri za'i grong khyer dang / sprul pa dang / gzugs brnyan lta bur khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum pa skyed pa/ sems can
6b3('bum): thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud dang / shes pa phra ba dang / spyod pa dang / mos pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang
6b4('bum): ba med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa R+Ya dbas po che dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyamadapa nyid du gtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas
6b5('bum): pa chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa chos thams cad la dbang shi na tu thob
6b6('bum): pa dang / las dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol ba/ brten pa gtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa/ rten cing
7a1('bum): m+b+hi na dang 'dra / tu mas na dri la rigapa sa
7a2('bum): ngos grangs skyed pa bzhugs pa sa rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtel 'dzud pa ma
7a3('bum): thams cad du nye bar 'gro ba la mkhas pa sangs rgyas dpag tu myong pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas po/ sems can gyi lce dus tshogs kyis yongs su
7a4('bum): bskyed pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin pargya stong mngon par sprul dpa la mkhas pa rnam par byes ma zhes kyi rgyags par bye
7b1('bum): mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal pa mtha' yas par myi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag drang thabs gcig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems da pa'i sems dpa' chen po bzang
7b2('bum): skyong dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byung gnas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po dang / byang chub sems pa
7b3('bum): sems dpa' chen po rin chen 'byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ded dpon dam pa dang / byang chub sems dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
7b4('bum): chen po skyes bus byin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyo ba sbed dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chu bdag lha dang / byang chub
7b5('bum): sgoms dpa' sems dpa' chen po dbang pos byin dang / byang chub sems dpa'o sems dpa' chen po bzang skyongadang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla
7b6('bum): glos dam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po d+mo glos 'phel ba dang / byang chub
7b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don yod mthong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshan
8a1('bum): po sgrib med blo gros dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu dam pas rnam par
8a2('bum): gnon pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson pa dang dbyang
8a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu sbyor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtong brtson pa dang / byaHhrIHsems dpa' sems dpa'
8a4('bum): chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang / byang chub sems da 'a sems dpa' chen po zla ba'i snying po dang / byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras
8a5('bum): gzigs kyi dbang po dang / byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe'i chen po 'jam dpal/ 
8a6('bum): gagazhon nur gyu rad pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs rab tu 'jom pa dang / rngabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros
8a7('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu lag brkyang dang / byang che ba
8a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje cher sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyan chen po nga byang chub sems dang / 
8b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ri bo'i zom dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen ste byam bya ba bya
8b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nus de'i tshe la bcom ldan 'ongs nyid
8b3('bum): ba dan seng ge'i khri bshams nas/ sku dang por bsrangs te/ dgongs pa mngon tu bzhag nasabaskyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so// dor bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gang du tang
8b4('bum): nge 'dzin thams cad 'du ba dang / khongs su chud pa dang / rjes su 'brang ba dang / 'du bar gyur po'i ting nge 'dzin gi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhag go/ 
8b5('bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par ma khyen pas ting nge 'dzin de dag lus bzhengs te/ 'phrul gi skyon gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di la rnam
8b6('bum): par gzigs so// de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad las 'od rab tu bkyeng ste/ de'i zhabs kyi 'thil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa
8b7('bum): gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stor drug cu drug cu byung ngo / zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu
8b8('bum): byung ngo // zhabs kyi long bu gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs byin pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya
9a1('bum): stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs pus mo gnyis las kyang 'o zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // zhabs brla gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba
9a2('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // sku sta zur gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // dang skra lte ba'i dkyil 'khor las kyang 'od gzor
9a3('bum): 5bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rtad drug cu byung ngo // sku rtsib logs gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal/ 
9a4('bum): gau bye'u las kyang 'od zer bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug du byung ngo // phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // phyag lag ngar
9a5('bum): gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong / drug cu drug cu byung ngo // sku phrag pa gnyis las kyang 'ad gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung po
9a6('bum): 'gur nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug / byung ngo // tshems mchi ba bzhi las kyang 'odagazer bye ba khro go khrig brgya steng drug cu drug cu byung ngo / 
9a7('bum): tshems bzhi bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // spyan gnyis las kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khri ga brgya stong drug ca drug cu byung ngo // snyan gnyis las
9a8('bum): kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // shangs kyi sbubs gnyis las kyang 'od gzor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo // smin 'tshams kyi
9b1('bum): mdzod spu nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu das byung ngo // steng gi gi gtsug tor nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig ma brgya stong drug cu drug tu byung ngo // kr-i zhal gyi
9b2('bum): sgo nas kyang 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug tu drug cu byung ste/ 'od gzer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyis slong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rte ru gi
9b3('bum): khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi
9b4('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang phyogs su
9b5('bum): 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba che/ chen pos khyab par byas so// byang shar gri phyogs 'tsham/ su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye mo snyed snang
9b6('bum): ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sharI lho'i phyogs 'tsham sa su 'jig rten khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba rje na pos khyab par byas so// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams su
9b7('bum): 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par
9b8('bum): byas so/ 'og gi phyogs su 'jog rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba
10a1('bum): chen pos khyab par byas so// sems gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
10a2('bum): nges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od gzer rab tu bkye ba mdzad de/ 'od des kyang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di
10a3('bum): snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang
10a4('bum): gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so nub phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang po chen pos khyad por byas so// byang phyogs su 'jig rten
10a5('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khya khaM par byas so// byang shar gi phyogs 'tshams su 'ji ga rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen po
10a6('bum): khyab par byas so// shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten
10a7('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// 
10a8('bum): 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par
10b1('bum): byas so// sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yan/ 
10b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gi 'od kyis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// shar phyogs su 'jig rten
10b3('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub phyogs
10b4('bum): su 'jigs rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed sna drang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos
10b5('bum): khyab par mdzad do// byang shar gi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba rna na pos khyab par mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams
10b6('bum): su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed srung ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab
10b7('bum): par mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyadab par mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i
10b8('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// steng gi ba phyogs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// sems can gang gis/ 
11a1('bum): 'od de mthong ba dang / 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
11a2('bum): kyis zhal gi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram ste / stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang pos khyab par mdzad nas/ zhal 'dzum pa
11a3('bum): mdzad do// ljags kyi dbang po de las kyang 'od gzer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mtho nad te/ 'od gzer de dag thams cad la pad mo mang po rin po che sna tshogs
11a4('bum): kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gi mdog tu snang ba 'dab dam steng dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ blta na sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ khwa dog bzung ba/ dri zhim pa
11a5('bum): 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin da ka ltar reg na bde bar gyur pa/ sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur du te/ pad mo de dag la yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs
11a6('bum): shring / 'di lta ste/ pha rold tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs
11a7('bum): shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos stend to// de dag lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma
11a8('bum): snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos stond to/ de dag nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gong ga'i
11b1('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang / ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos stond to// de dag byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten
11b2('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyinang pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos stonang to// de dag byang sharar+ya gyi phyogs
11b3('bum): 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'dri lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos
11b4('bum): stond to// de dag shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'dzi ga rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu phyin nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa
11b5('bum): drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston/ da to// de dag lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rte/ rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / 
11b6('bum): de dag tu byon nus 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyis chos stond to// de dge nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i// 
11b7('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos stond to// de dag 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gA'i
11b8('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rold tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstand pa 'di nyid kyi chos stond to// de dag steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten
12a1('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing / de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyind pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos stond to// sems
12a2('bum): can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bdan seng gi'i khri la
12a3('bum): bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par gzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'du mdzad nas
12a4('bum): stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rnam dpa drug tu g.yos te/ g.yos so// rab tu g.yos kun tu g.yos spro 'gul lo// rab tu 'gul lo// kun
12a5('bum): tu 'gul lo// ldeg go rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu ldeg go// che ma mem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu chem che/ ma mo// 'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu 'ur 'ur ro/ 
12a6('bum): shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu shog shig go// mtha' mtho na dbus dma'/ dbus mtho na ni mtha' dma' ste/ dal bus pags kyis nyams su bde bar sems
12a7('bum): can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bskyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na sems can dmyal
12a8('bum): kha dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / myi khom pa dang / ngan song dang / ngan 'gro dang / log par ltung ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun 'chang
12b1('bum): par gyur da te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur da to// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mtshem
12b2('bum): dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang mi de dag dga' ba dang / myos pa dang / 
12b3('bum): nyams bde ba de de nyid kyis sngon gi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur da pa de dag bcom ldan
12b4('bum): 'das gang na bA der dong zhing phyi nad nas/ bcom ldi na 'das la phyag 'tshal bar gyurd to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ shar phyogs
12b5('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig
12b6('bum): rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad myi khom po thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag
12b7('bum): dang de lha de dag dga' bo dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde' ba de nyid kyis sngon gi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde
12b8('bum): ba dang thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas gi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung
13a1('bum): du dong zhing phyi nad nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bamam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyar zhing 'dud par gyur to// 
13a2('bum): de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang
13a3('bum): gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ myi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam por skyes so// de nas myi de dag
13a4('bum): dang lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams badra ba de nyid dkyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran pa nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde' bya
13a5('bum): thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong
13a6('bum): zhing phyin nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud
13a7('bum): tsam thong gcig la/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
13a8('bum): thams cad kyang rgyun chadamyi zhom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang ltar skal ba mnyam par skyos so// de nas myi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba
13b1('bum): dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur pa te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mes pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang
13b2('bum): gi rang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyi nad nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal
13b3('bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal me sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ byang phyogs kyi
13b4('bum): 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas tha mas cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun
13b5('bum): chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyurd te/ sem rdzas can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam/ par skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba
13b6('bum): dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos po dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang / 
13b7('bum): gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyi nad nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de
13b8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ byang shar gi phyogs
14a1('bum): 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams
14a2('bum): cad kyang rgyun chad de myi khyim pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur pa te/ sems can de dag thams cod kyang myi dang lhar skul ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas myi de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang mos pa
14a3('bum): dang / nyams bde bo de nyid kyi sngon gi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur do pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
14a4('bum): dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyi nad na zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs
14a5('bum): pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de da ga la thal mo sbyor zhang 'dud par gyu ra to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi
14a6('bum): 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song ga skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun tshod/ mi khom pa
14a7('bum): thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag dang lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams
14a8('bum): bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mes pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ 8
14b1('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyi nad nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
14b2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur du to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams
14b3('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byil song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ myi khom pa thams cad kyang nub
14b4('bum): par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos po dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis
14b5('bum): sngon gi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su da na nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bdel/ ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
14b6('bum): dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyi nad nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
14b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe/ skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang / 
14b8('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun 'chad myo khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur te/ 
15a1('bum): sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skye'o// de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te
15a2('bum): rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grang
15a3('bum): bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyi nad nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe
15a4('bum): skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje
15a5('bum): 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ myi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur da te/ sems can de dag thams cadakyang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam por skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang / 
15a6('bum): lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nya mos bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur pa te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang
15a7('bum): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyi nad nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin
15a8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gi
15b1('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang / byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad rta myi khom pa thams cad rgyun kyang nub par gyur te/ 
15b2('bum): sems can de dag thams cad kyang myi dang myi dang lhar skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang / lha de dag dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gi tshe rabs rjes su dran par
15b3('bum): gyurard te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang / mos pa dang / nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
15b4('bum): srungs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyi nad nas na zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra pa com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la thal mo sbyor
15b5('bum): zhing 'dud par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gi stong che na po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di ni/ sems can dmus long ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang myig gyis gzugs mthong
15b6('bum): bur gyur to// 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to// smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to// sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang 'khrug pa myed pa'i sems thob par gyur to// gos
15b7('bum): myed pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to// dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyurd to// bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to// skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyurd to// nad kyis btab pa
15b8('bum): rnams kyang nad med par gyur to// lus nyams rnams dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to// ngal rnams kyang ngal sos par
16a1('bum): gyur du to// lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tshe ba mi dge ba ma spangs pa rnams kyang lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang / 'tsho ba myi dge ba spangs
16a2('bum): prar gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper na/ pa dang / ma dang / phu nu dang / sring mo dang / mdza' bo dang / grogs po dang / mtshung pa'i sems kyis
16a3('bum): sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang / gtsang ba dang / nges pa'i dri nga ba myed de/ myi dge ba'i/ 
16a4('bum): rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur du to// de'i tshe se mas can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta bu dang ldan par gyur te/ dper na dge' slong bsam gton gsum
16a5('bum): pa la snyoms par zhugs pa bde ba de lta bu'i bde' ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe sems na rten thams cad la rnam pa 'di lta bu shes rab dang ldan par
16a6('bum): gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o// dul ba ni dge'o ba'o// zhi ba ni dge ba'o// sdom pa ni dge ba'o// bden pa ni dge bya'o// bgra byed pa ni dge ba'o// byams pa ni dge
16a7('bum): bla'o// snying rje ni dge ba'i// srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la myi 'tshe ba ni dge ba'i// zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das bdan seng ge'i khri de
16a8('bum): nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na/ nyi ma sgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa 'am/ zla ba nye ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsuM
16b1('bum): gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di gi khams 'di thams cad ri rab dang bcas khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ lho dang lce
16b2('bum): ma yin gi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil kyis mnand te bzhugs na/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal
16b3('bum): gis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan na/ lhang ngur bzhugs pa/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams zil kyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku
16b4('bum): mdog dang / gzi' brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzesashing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung
16b5('bum): gi bye ma snyed zil gris man nad te/ 'od dang sku mdo ga dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gis mdzes shing // / lham med/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du
16b6('bum): lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnand te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ ldan ne/ lhung nger/ 
16b7('bum): bzhugs so// de bzhin du nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis man nad te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi' brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing
16b8('bum): lham me lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du byang nam phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil kyis man nad te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang
18a1('bum): dpal gyis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ ljang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du byang shor gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zild kyis mnan
18a2('bum): te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gis mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan no/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du/ shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gla
18a3('bum): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan de te/ 'od dang sku mdog dang / gzi baN+Did dang / dpal gris mdzes shing / lham mo/ ldan ne/ lcong nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du lho nub kyi
18a4('bum): phyogs 'joms kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi dbye ma snyed zil kyis mnand te/ 'od dang / sku mdogadang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gis mdzes shing / 
18a5('bum): mi/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du nung khyung gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gis mnand te/ 'od dang
18a6('bum): sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gis mi dzes shing / lham me b+h+yo ldan ne/ lhung der bzhugs so// de bzhin du 'og go phyogs kyi 'jog rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi b+h+ya
18a7('bum): snying zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gyis mdzes gleng / l+h+wam me/ lhan ne/ ljang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig
18a8('bum): rten gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed rjem gyis munan te/ 'od dang / spu mdog dong / gzi brji dang / dpal gyis mdzes shing dang lham me/ ldan ne/ lA ba bzhugaso so/ l+la ste/ 
18b1('bum): dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri ra ba ni ri nag po gzhan zil gyis mnond par gnas pa ni mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger 'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i
18b2('bum): gzugs thams cad zil kyis gnond par gnas pa ni mdzes shing / lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'ang gzhan thams cad zil gyis
18b3('bum): gnond par gnas pa ni/ mdzes shing lham med lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gi khams lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ 
18b4('bum): tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas dpa zild kyis gnond par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang / sku mdog dang / gzi brjid dang / dpal gis mdzes shing
18b5('bum): lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi
18b6('bum): sku ji 'di ba de bzhin du bstand to// de nas yang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa lha'i ris drang / kun snang dang ba dang / tshangs ris dang
18b7('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 'phrul dga' dang / dga' ldan dang / mtshe ma dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs
18b8('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas/ dga' zhing spro ba dang / yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la nyams bde ba dang / yid
19a1('bum): bde ba skyes nas/ lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba dang / lha rdzas kyi spros dang / lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang / lha rdzas kyi gdug spos dang / lha rdzas kyi ud pa la
19a2('bum): dang / pad mo dang / ku mu ta dang / pun d+ha ri ka dang / na li na dang / so'u gan di dang / lha rdzas kyi me tog ke sa ra dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyun dang / 
19a3('bum): lha rdzas kyi gdugs dang / lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang / lha rdzas kyi ba dan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyi nad nas/ me togu dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / 
19a4('bum): byug pa dang / phye ma dang / gdug spos dang / ud pa la/ dang / pad mo dang / ku mu da dang / pun da ri ka dang / na li/ na dang / so'u gan d+ha dang / me tog kye sa ra dang / ta ma la'i
19a5('bum): lo ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / lha'i ba dan ga gis bcom ldan 'das la gtord to// mngon par gtorang to// rab tu gtord to// 
19a6('bum): stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang / snod du gyur pa'i myi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/ 
19a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyind nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to// me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye mo la stsogs pa dang
19a8('bum): na bza dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dngu'i steng gi
19b1('bum): nam mkha' la me tog la stsogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gnas par gyur to// khang pa rtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi ma
19b2('bum): tog dang / dang gi lda ldi mang po mngon par 'phyang bar gyur to// rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to// me tog dang / dar gi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi/ 
19b3('bum): khams 'di mdzes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser gi kha dog lta bu des kyang shin tu mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger gyur da te/ stong gsum gi
19b4('bum): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bani na du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba
19b5('bum): des khyab par cing gsal bar gyur da to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal ba
19b6('bum): gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi/ 
19b7('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsil bar gyur to// byang shir gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i
19b8('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur do to// shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / 
20a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gri khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan/ 
20a2('bum): 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des
20a3('bum): khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur te/ steng
20a4('bum): ga phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khya rab cing gsal bar gyu rad to// de la 'dzam bu'i gang gi mi
20a5('bum): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas cho go myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na
20a6('bum): bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'dzam bu'i gling gi myi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi myi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog/ 
20a7('bum): myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'od snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// shar gi lus 'phags po'i mi
20a8('bum): rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong ba nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shi
20b1('bum): stond to snyam mo// byang gi sgra myi snyan gi myi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs
20b2('bum): pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond te snyem mo// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam
20b3('bum): du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos sto nad to// snyam mo/ sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
20b4('bum): blta bas cho ga myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyu rad te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag da cig gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ste nad to snyam mo/ 
20b5('bum): mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam dus mus par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag
20b6('bum): gri mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// dga' ldan gri lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur/ 
20b7('bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bras chog mi shes
20b8('bum): pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur do to// de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams/ 
21a1('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs
21a2('bum): shing chos stond to snyam mo// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur de ti/ dri bzhin
21a3('bum): gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond te/ snyam mo// tshangs lnga nye phan gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa
21a4('bum): mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de ba zhon gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos sto nad to snyam mo// tshangs pa kun 'khor
21a5('bum): gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ba bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sa skyes par gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs bu bdag
21a6('bum): cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// tshangs chen gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur/ 
21a7('bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nasa'adi snyam
21a8('bum): du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// chung snang gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs po'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa
21b1('bum): pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs
21b2('bum): pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnaMs
21b3('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra blta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyom mo// 
21b4('bum): dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur/ dad te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun bzhugs
21b5('bum): shing chos stond to snyam mo// chung dga'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyurard te/ de bzhin gshegs
21b6('bum): pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par 'gyur
21b7('bum): te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du/ 
21b8('bum): sems par gyur da te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi bdun na bzhugs shing chos sto nad to/ snyam mo/ che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i skra lta bas chog mi shes pa mthong nas
22a1('bum): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// chung che'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta/ 
22a2('bum): bsu chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'dri snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams kyi de bzhin
22a3('bum): gsheg so pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du/ mas par gyu rad te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing choso stond to snyam mo// 'bras bu
22a4('bum): che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun
22a5('bum): na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// myi che ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur dete
22a6('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di
22a7('bum): sbom du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gis mdun na bzhugs shing chos stonang to snyam mo// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
22a8('bum): blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur date/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams
22b1('bum): kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ dri bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to/ 
22b2('bum): 'og myin gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs po'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyurd te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag mdun na bzhugs
22b3('bum): shing chos stond to/ 19/ 'og myin gi lha rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
22b4('bum): bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo/ de bzhin du stong gi 'jig rten gi khams kyi myi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
22b5('bum): blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du se mas par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos stond to snyam mo// 
22b6('bum): stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi myi thams cad dang lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chag myi shes pa mthong nas/ 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 
22b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs drug gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// song gsum gi snod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi myi thams cad dang lnga thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs kyi
22b8('bum): slobs pas chog mi shes ma mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na ba tsugs shing / chos ston to snyam mo// de nas yang bcom ldan
23a1('bum): 'das kyis bdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu dgye ba mdzad de/ yang 'od des stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rab tu snang bar gyur to// 
23a2('bum): shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// nub phyogs
23a3('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi 'jog rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye me snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// byang shur gri phyogs
23a4('bum): 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang go'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyurd to// shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten go khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab
23a5('bum): tu snang bar gyur da to// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar/ 'gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi
23a6('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten go khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig
23a7('bum): rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang rab tu snang bar gyur du to// 'od des stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten go khams 'di na sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad
23a8('bum): kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub
23b1('bum): sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyu rad to// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dug gis/ 
23b2('bum): kyang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
23b3('bum): dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' khor dang bcas pa thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na
23b4('bum): sems can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gyis kyang stong gsum gi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
23b5('bum): sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thabs gcig tu/ bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten
23b6('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyid po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
23b7('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge' 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang bcas pa thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur
23b8('bum): to/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'don
24a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang
24a2('bum): thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyu rad to// byang shar gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten go khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag nag sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag
24a3('bum): gris kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shug kya thub pa dge slong gi
24a4('bum): dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor sAr dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// da shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten go khams gang ga'i
24a5('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
24a6('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kyi thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// 
24a7('bum): nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di
24a8('bum): ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs cig/ 
24b1('bum): tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong / 
24b2('bum): chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub
24b3('bum): sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ sems can gang ji snyed 'khod pa de
24b4('bum): dgra gyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi/ khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dragra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa
24b5('bum): dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i// 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
24b6('bum): snyed po de dag na/ sems can gong ji snyed 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'i di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dge bcom pa
24b7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyurar to// de nas shar phyogs/ 
24b8('bum): logs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol tu ni 'jig rten gi khams rin chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom po yang / 
25a1('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
25a2('bum): nyid kyang yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug pus snang ba chen po de dang / sa g.yos/ 
25a3('bum): pade dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas gang ni bder
25a4('bum): song ste phyind nas rna bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
25a5('bum): 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / dog sa la 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di lta buci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen de
25a6('bum): skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin can 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
25a7('bum): 'od gzer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gri khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi
25a8('bum): mched ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
25b1('bum): chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das
25b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams myi mjed der/ bcom
25b3('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
25b4('bum): po de dag kun kyang phal tsher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu/ 
25b5('bum): thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'ang / nyes de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen 'byung gnas kyis pa/ ka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par/ 
25b6('bum): shes na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der song shigate de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub
25b7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas 'byung ba la pad mo rin po rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'dra
25b8('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad mo rin po che 'di dag gis gto rad cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
26a1('bum): bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gis der
26a2('bum): nyams par gyur da ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od gzer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
26a3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin can 'byung gnas de las pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba
26a4('bum): dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye/ da ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ shwar phyogs
26a5('bum): kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma/ 
26a6('bum): dang / naM bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bai dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub ses
26a7('bum): dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thob pa gang na
26a8('bum): ba der dong ste phyinang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 
26b1('bum): chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
26b2('bum): rin can 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'di ste/ 
26b3('bum): pad mo gser gi mdog can lo ma stong dang ldan pa 'ad dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin can 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom
26b4('bum): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang nga dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag
26b5('bum): bzhes nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
26b6('bum): gang na ba der gto rad to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gi khams de dag rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di
26b7('bum): ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
26b8('bum): chub tu nges par gyurar to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ 
27a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim 'gor byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so/ mchod
27a2('bum): byas so// / bam po gnyis pa'o// de nas lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gri khaMs/ 
27a3('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun kyi pha rol na nga 'jig rten gi khams mya ngan myed pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pI
27a4('bum): dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyeng ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tung phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig
27a5('bum): rten gi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya nga / na med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / lngas char g.yos pa de dag dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'o
27a6('bum): blta bas cho ga myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngon myed pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das
27a7('bum): de bzhin gshegos pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsolang to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jog rten du byung ba dang / rigs
27a8('bum): 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
27b1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas mya dran myed pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang phyogs logs su 'jig/ 
27b2('bum): rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya
27b3('bum): thub zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stond te/ 'dri ni de'i mthu yin te de 'da'o// de nas byang chub seMs
27b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pas/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
27b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gi khams myi mched der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa teyang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba
27b6('bum): dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur po/ gzungs drang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa
27b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
27b8('bum): bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gyis
28a1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pa'i dpal la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gi mdog can stong bskurd te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan
28a2('bum): 'das de bzhin gri shegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs po'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bgra yod par
28a3('bum): spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag na mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang
28a4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan myed pas ba com ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal dri las
28a5('bum): pad mo rin po che gser gi mdog can 'dob ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rabs tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bya ba
28a6('bum): khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhong de dag de nas myi snang bar gyu rang nas lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong
28a7('bum): das lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug po dang
28a8('bum): phye ma dang / na bza'i dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems
28b1('bum): dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der
28b2('bum): dong ste/ phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nasatebyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
28b3('bum): mya ngan myed pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed mchog dpral
28b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mo dag bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan no/ bde ba dang dgos par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser ga
28b5('bum): mdog can lo ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom lnga na 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan myed pa'i dpal gis/ bcom
28b6('bum): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas pa de dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs
28b7('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gto rad to// de nas pad mo de dag kyis 'jig rten gi khams de dag
28b8('bum): thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur de te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos stonang to// chos bstan pa der/ 
29a1('bum): sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim
29a2('bum): pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ni
29a3('bum): sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa la rim gor byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod par byas so// de nas nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gi khams grang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ 
29a4('bum): 'das pa kun kyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gi khams nye ba daro zhi ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag/ bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin can 'od 'phro
29a5('bum): zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi phar/ lad tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas
29a6('bum): 'jig rten gi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs
29a7('bum): pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cin 'od 'phro gang na ba der dong ste phyi nang nas/ bcom
29a8('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu byung ba dang / ngogs
29b1('bum): 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang / 
29b2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la 'di skad ces bka' stsald to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar phyogs logs
29b3('bum): su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams myi mdzes ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/ 
29b4('bum): sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond te/ de'adi ni
29b5('bum): de'i mthu' yin te de 'da'o// de nas byang chub sems/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
29b6('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin cen 'od 'phra la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
29b7('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher
29b8('bum): gzhon nur gyur dpa / gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchis
30a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal da pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der song
30a2('bum): shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin ce na 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros la pad mo rin
30a3('bum): po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya
30a4('bum): thub pa de la pad+ma mo 'di dag gis gto rad cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci de'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub
30a5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gis der nyams par gyur to re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros
30a6('bum): kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin can 'od 'phro de las pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan po de dag blangs/ 
30a7('bum): te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhong de nas myi snang bar gyur/ 
30a8('bum): nasatenub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyang ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / gdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / 
30b1('bum): na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'drul
30b2('bum): chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kyi thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyinang nas
30b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros
30b4('bum): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin ce na 'od 'phrosadebacom
30b5('bum): ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mtsha sa sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam bde ba dang dgos par spyod dam zhes 'di ste/ pad mo gser
30b6('bum): can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin bshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin can 'od 'phros/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod
30b7('bum): pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi
30b8('bum): gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad mo de dag gyis 'jig rten gyi
31a1('bum): khams de dag thams cad kyang rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtses
31a2('bum): te chos stond to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gyis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub tu nges par gyur/ 
31a3('bum): to/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa deng / ngag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de
31a4('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gor byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod par byas so// de nas
31a5('bum): byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klu nga gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gi kha mas rgyal ba zhes bya ba yod de// de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag/ 
31a6('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid/ 
31a7('bum): yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de
31a8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bltan chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba der dong ste phyinang nas
31b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di
31b2('bum): lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyute/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
31b3('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la 'di dag skad ces ka stsal to// rigs kyi bu
31b4('bum): 'di ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco
31b5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu
31b6('bum): phyind pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
31b7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
31b8('bum): pa dgagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang
32a1('bum): phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag
32a2('bum): blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed
32a3('bum): der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la bde/ 
32a4('bum): me rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gi mdo dag can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhi dani gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sarba/ 
32a5('bum): rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtor/ da cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gi khams
32a6('bum): der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal
32a7('bum): bas byon gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po de las pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan
32a8('bum): pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te
32b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ byang chub phyogs kyi 'jig rten na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang
32b2('bum): spos dang / gdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gyis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu
32b3('bum): bdud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems rdzu 'phrul chen pos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
32b4('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub dpa gang na ba der dong ste phyi nang nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig
32b5('bum): du 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chubab sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin kyis bcom ldan 'daso la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom
32b6('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po/ bcom ldan 'das la bskyon myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde
32b7('bum): 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dges par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ 
32b8('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
33a1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs/ 
33a2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtord to// de nas pad mo de dag gyis 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de'i
33a3('bum): dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos stond to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag
33a4('bum): thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / 
33a5('bum): bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de dbazhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag/ 
33a6('bum): kya thub pa la rim 'gor byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas byang shar gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gyi bye ma snyed
