33a7('bum): 'das pa kun gyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gi khams ting nge 'dzin kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzind
33a8('bum): gri glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad de// 
33b1('bum): de nas 'jig rten gi khams de na de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnond pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug byas snang ba chen po de dang / sra cher g.yos pa de dang / 
33b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog myi shes pa de mthong nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gi glang po dram
33b3('bum): pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces/ 
33b4('bum): gso lang to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu dag rten du byung ba dang / dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu ci'i
33b5('bum): rkyen dadri skad ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis
33b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par glan nad pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams
33b7('bum): gong go'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mched ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa
33b8('bum): zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// 'di ni de'i mthu' yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub
34a1('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnond pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting
34a2('bum): nge 'dzin gi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gi khamasu myi mdzad dar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang
34a3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang da de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur/ 
34a4('bum): pa gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa ting nge 'dzind dang / snyoms par 'jug rar pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ 
34a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gi gla/ nga po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gi
34a6('bum): khams myi mjed der song shig de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag por rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzind gi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' seMs
34a7('bum): dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnond pa la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
34a8('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad ma 'di dag gi gto rad cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig
34b1('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub
34b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnond pa'i sa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin
34b3('bum): gi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las pad mo gser gau mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs
34b4('bum): su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur de nas/ byang sha ru gi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
34b5('bum): gang ji snyed cig bzhugs zhing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / gdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang
34b6('bum): gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bya dan dag gyis rim 'gor bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpo'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang
34b7('bum): chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kyi thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das
34b8('bum): kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ 
35a1('bum): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis
35a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde' 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam/ zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma
35a3('bum): stong dang ldan pa 'di drag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad
35a4('bum): du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang shar gi phyogs 'tshams kyi
35a5('bum): 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de ba bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gto rad to// de nas pad mo de
35a6('bum): dag gyis 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur du te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shang / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid btsas
35a7('bum): te chos stond to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gyis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems
35a8('bum): dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gi rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
35b1('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye/ 
35b2('bum): ma snyed 'das pa kun kyi pha rol na 'jig rten gi khams byang chub kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ do na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
35b3('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par stond pa
35b4('bum): mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo zhes bya ba 'dug 'du dag pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin
35b5('bum): gshegs pa'i sku blta na cho ga myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der
35b6('bum): dong ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de la de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di
35b7('bum): lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
35b8('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo la 'di skad ces gsol bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub
36a1('bum): gyi phyogs 'tshams logs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom/ 
36a2('bum): pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stond te te 'di ni
36a3('bum): de'i mthu yan te de 'da'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po log na pad mos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
36a4('bum): pad mo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gri khams myi mjed der/ dbacom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa
36a5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi' zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang
36a6('bum): phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du
36a7('bum): mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gi khams mi mjed der
36a8('bum): song shig de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mo de la pad
36b1('bum): mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gi mdog can stong bsku rang te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag
36b2('bum): kya thub pa de la bud mo 'od dgra gis gto rad cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems
36b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur da ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag ni pad mos/ bcom ldan
36b4('bum): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog dasra pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal de lasau pad mo gser gi mdog can 'das ma stong dang ljon pa de dag blangs
36b5('bum): te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khri/ grwa brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi
36b6('bum): de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug
36b7('bum): spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye mo dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gor bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / 
36b8('bum): mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/ 
37a1('bum): rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig du 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas dbyung / 
37a2('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pad mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
37a3('bum): sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la spyan myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde' 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgos par spyod
37a4('bum): dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de ba bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
37a5('bum): rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'ang/ sa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
37a6('bum): sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas pad me de dgra bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
37a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtord to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
37a8('bum): mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos stond to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dge
37b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi
37b2('bum): dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchod
37b3('bum): pa byas so// de nas lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun kyi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gi khams rdul gi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba yod
37b4('bum): de de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i da dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems
37b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de na sa 'jig rten gi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
37b6('bum): chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de
37b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba'i dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga'
37b8('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang / dog sa
38a1('bum): 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'dri ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
38a2('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi mi dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu
38a3('bum): 'di ni byang shar gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gi khams myi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par
38a4('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shug kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shidang 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dpo rnams la shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stond te/ 'di ni de'i
38a5('bum): mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sadra
38a6('bum): rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
38a7('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang phal char gzhon nur gyur pa
38a8('bum): gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
38b1('bum): pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal da pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gi khams mi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs/ 
38b2('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi
38b3('bum): rgyu las byung ba gser gi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shig kya thub pa de la padad+ma mo 'di dag gis
38b4('bum): gtor cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhong der bag yo dra par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams drer skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
38b5('bum): ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur da// re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi// ma'o rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
38b6('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las pad mo gser gi mdo gcan 'dab ma steng dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems
38b7('bum): dpa'i khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas
38b8('bum): lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / gdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang
39a1('bum): na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim 'gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu
39a2('bum): 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu' chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kyi thub pa gong na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ 
39a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas bcom
39a4('bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'danas de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzog/ nges pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal
39a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde' ba dang dgos par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gasde
39a6('bum): gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gis/ 
39a7('bum): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas lho
39a8('bum): nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtord to// 
39b1('bum): de nas pad mo de dag gyis 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa/ 
39b2('bum): drug po 'di dag nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par
39b3('bum): gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom
39b4('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim 'gor dbyas so// bkur stir byas so/ phu dud du byas so/ 
39b5('bum): mched pa byas so// de nas nub byang gri phyogs 'tshams su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das po kun gi pha rol na/ 'jig rten gi khams dbang du/ 
39b6('bum): gyur pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de no de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa'o// 
39b7('bum): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin cen
39b8('bum): mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na cho ga myi shes pa de mthong bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom/ 
40a1('bum): ba yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa gang na ba der song ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa
40a2('bum): de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen de skad
40a3('bum): ces gsold pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin cen mchog la 'di skad ces
40a4('bum): bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar lho'i phyogs 'tsham das logs su 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed/ 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na
40a5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi
40a6('bum): pha rolang tu phyind pa ston ti/ 'di ni de'i mthu' yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' bo rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
40a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gi khams myi mched der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
40a8('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so/ 
40b1('bum): so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa/ de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/ 
40b2('bum): bka' stsal pa da rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam
40b3('bum): pas nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gas rig mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
40b4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gto rad cig/ rigs kyi bu sang+ga rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na
40b5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems da 'a chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyam sa par gyur da ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
40b6('bum): chen po rin can mchog gyis te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las pad mo gas rig mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag
40b7('bum): blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas
40b8('bum): nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / gdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang na/ 
41a1('bum): bza' za dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror bya dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud dud du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing byang chub sems
41a2('bum): dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu' chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shog kyi thub pa
41a3('bum): gtan po der dong ste phyi nad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhibs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems
41a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcomad ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
41a5('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sama?/ zo bdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam da bde
41a6('bum): ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'di ste/ pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
41a7('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
41a8('bum): rgyas shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
41b1('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtord to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin
41b2('bum): gshegs pa'i sku mang mo bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos stond to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag
41b3('bum): thams cad kyang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i
41b4('bum): gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub
41b5('bum): pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so/ phu du/ du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas 'og gi phyog sa kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das
41b6('bum): pa kun gyi pha rol da na?/ 'jig rten gi khams pad mo can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs/ 
41b7('bum): shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gi khams den/ byang chub sas
41b8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'dra
42a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gang na ba der dong ste phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang // 
42a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs
42a3('bum): pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub
42a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la 'di skad ces/ bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na
42a5('bum): 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasra shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // 
42a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa stond te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas/ bcom
42a7('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal la 'di skad ces bya// 'astsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der/ bcom
42a8('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag
42b1('bum): kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi/ 
42b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad mo'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs/ 
42b3('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pa la/ pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gi mdog can
42b4('bum): stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dpa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gis gtord cig/ rigs kyi bu
42b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dga' ba yin gis/ der
42b6('bum): nyams par gyur ta ra/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pad mo dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo'i dpal
42b7('bum): de las pad ma gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma
42b8('bum): dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ 'og gi 'phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dpa/ 
43a1('bum): gdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gris rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu/ 
43a2('bum): dung du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
43a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig du 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu
43a4('bum): 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpad mo dam pa'i sa/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad tsos degaso long to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
43a5('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la spun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams
43a6('bum): dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
43a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bco ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slar du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
43a8('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas shag kyi thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par/ 
43b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gto rad to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs/ 
43b2('bum): pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos stond to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gyis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na myed
43b3('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang ngang gi dge ba'i rtsa
43b4('bum): bas te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom dpa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so
43b5('bum): mchod pa byas so// de nas steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha rol du/ ne/ 'jig rten gi khams mdangs dga' ba yod de/ de na de
43b6('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha/ 
43b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa 'di nyid yang dag par stond pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gi khams de na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang / 
43b8('bum): sa cher g.yos pa de dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog myi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpas
44a1('bum): gang na ba dir dong ste phyi nad nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan/ 
44a2('bum): 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang / dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyud ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol dra ba dang / bcom
44a3('bum): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dbugs/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
44a4('bum): to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi kha dmas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jug rten gi/ khams myi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs
44a5('bum): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo // de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha
44a6('bum): rol tu phyind pa stond te/ 'di ni de'i mthu' yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
44a7('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal la 'di skad ces gas lod te// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gi khams myi mchod der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
44a8('bum): bdagra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de blta ba dang / de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal che
44b1('bum): gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// 
44b2('bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dga' ba'i dpal kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na/ 'jig rten gi khams myi mjed der song shig/ de nas de bzhin
44b3('bum): gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byin la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba
44b4('bum): gser ga mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzoganges pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa de la pad mo 'di dag gyis
44b5('bum): gto rad cig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten kham/ sa der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
44b6('bum): de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yi ni gis der nyams par gyur ta re dro nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byind pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang
44b7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i dpal de las pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang bu mo'i
44b8('bum): gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas myi snang bar gyur nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
45a1('bum): 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang / spos dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / rgyan dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dag gis rim gror/ 
45a2('bum): bya ba dang / bkuri stir bya ba dang / phu dung du bya ba dang / mchod pa byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra/ 
45a3('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shug kya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyi nang nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ phyogs
45a4('bum): gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' bas byind pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag/ 
45a5('bum): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' ba'i// dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun myi mnga' 'am/ gnod// pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan
45a6('bum): nam/ bde ba dang dgos par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag pA/ 
45a7('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dga' bo'i dpal gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
45a8('bum): rgyas shag kya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
45b1('bum): sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gto rad to// de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i
45b2('bum): sku mang po bzhugs shing / 'di ltar pha rol tu phyind pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos stond to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang / bla na
45b3('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag
45b4('bum): gyos kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'odas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kya thub pa la rim gror byas so// 
45b5('bum): bkur stir byas so/ phu dung du byas so// mchod pa byas so// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ stong gsum gi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams 'di rin
45b6('bum): po che'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur da te/ me tog sil ma sna tshogs kyis kun tu gang ba dang / dar gi lda ldi dang / chun pos kun nas bres pa dang / snod sna tshogs nas gdug
45b7('bum): spos sna tshogs 'thul ba dang / dpag bsam ga shing rgyan dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs kyi yal ga'i rtse mo g.yur ze ba me tog gi shing dang / 'bras bu'i shing dang / spos kyi shing dang
45b8('bum): 'phreng ba'i shing dang / phye ma'i shing dang / gdug spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur da te/ 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag btso/ 
46a1('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun nas rgyas bu'i rgyas po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / lha'i bu blo gros shin tu brtan pa/ 
46a2('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gzi' brjid chen po 'khod pa'i 'jig rten gi khams pad ma can bzhin du gyur to// / 
46a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa stong phrag brgya pa las / gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// 
46a4('bum): bam po gsum pa'o// // // de'i tshe de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi sa 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ dge
46a5('bum): spyong dang bram ze'i skye dgur bcas pa/ lha dang myi dang / lha ma yin dang bcas pa mang po tshogs pa dang / byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon
46a6('bum): nor gyur pa/ pad mo de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsa med pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
46a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan
46a8('bum): pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya
46b1('bum): bar 'tshal bas ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bgyi// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka'
46b2('bum): stsal to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas pa myed pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa dang / gtong ba dang / 
46b3('bum): yongs su len pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir yongs su btang ba myed pa'i tshul gis/ sbyin po'i pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par byed/ ltung ba dang myi ltung bla med pa'i phyir/ 
46b4('bum): tshul khrims kyi pho rolod tu phyin du po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'khrug pa myed pa'i phyir bzod po'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// lus dang sris
46b5('bum): sems kyi brtson 'grus nyam pa myed pa'i phyir// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya/ 'o// 'khrug pa myed cing yongs su rtog pa myed pa'i phyir/ 
46b6('bum): bsam gtan gri pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// chos thams cad myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ sha r-i dA/ 
46b7('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su
46b8('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ yang dag par spong ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ yang dag par spong ba
47a1('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa myi dmyigs pa'i/ 
47a2('bum): phyir da rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ dbang po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ 
47a3('bum): dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ stobs myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga yongs
47a4('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ byang chub kyi yan lag myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
47a5('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ lam mi dmyigs
47a6('bum): pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ stong po
47a7('bum): nyid mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te
47a8('bum): mtshan ma myed pa'i myi dmyigs pa'i phyir mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
47b1('bum): la gnas te/ smon pa myed pa myi myigs pa'i phyir smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
47b2('bum): tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan myi dmyigs pa'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu
47b3('bum): phyi nad pa la gnas te/ tshad myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir tshad myed pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa/ 
47b4('bum): lo gnas te/ gzugs myed pa'i myi dmyigs pa'i phyir gzu gas myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
47b5('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nod pa la gnas te/ rnam par tha rad pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rnam par thar pa brgya/ da yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
47b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ mthar kyis gnas pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
47b7('bum): dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ mngon par shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir mngon par/ 
47b8('bum): shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ 'du shes dgu bsgom par bya ste/ 'di ltar rnam
48a1('bum): rnam par bam pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinang pa/ 
48a2('bum): la gnas te ta 'bru can myi dmyigs pa'i phyir 'bro can gi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te
48a3('bum): rnam par brnags pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rnam par brnags pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te
48a4('bum): rnam par dmar ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sem/ ngas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad
48a5('bum): pa la gnas te/ rnam par sngos pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rna/ ma par bsngos pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
48a6('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par zos pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab/ 
48a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par 'thor ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi
48a8('bum): pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rus pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rus pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la
48b1('bum): gnas te/ rnam par tshig pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
48b2('bum): gnas te/ zas myi mthun pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ zas la myi mthun pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
48b3('bum): phyi nad pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas myi dmyigs pa'i phyir sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom por bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
48b4('bum): phyind pa la gnas te/ chos myi dmyigs pa'i phyir chos / sa su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ta'i bu byang chub so mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
48b5('bum): phyi nad pa la gnas te/ dge 'dun myi dmyigs pa'i phyir dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha/ 
48b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ tshul khrims myi dmyigs pa'i phyir tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha/ 
48b7('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ gtong ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
48b8('bum): phyi nad pa la gnas te/ lha myi dmyigs pa'i phyiraro lha rjes su don pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ 
49a1('bum): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
49a2('bum): tu phyind pa la gnas te/ skyo ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir skyo ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas
49a3('bum): teta'achi ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir 'tsho ba rjes su dran po bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ lus myi
49a4('bum): dmyigs pa'i phyir lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ myi rtag pa myi
49a5('bum): dmyigs pa'i phyir myi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sdug sngal/ 
49a6('bum): myi dmigs pa'i phyir sdug bsngal gi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bdag myong
49a7('bum): pa myi dmyigs po'i phyir bdag myed pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lo gnas te/ myi sdug pa myi rimyigs
49a8('bum): pa'i phyir myi sdug po'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ 'chi ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'chi
49b1('bum): ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ dga' bar myi bya ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir 'jig
49b2('bum): rten thams cad la dga' bar mi bya ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang po la gnas te/ yid brtan
49b3('bum): du myi rung ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyiraro yid brtan du myi rung ba'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te
49b4('bum): sdug bsngal myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha re dwa ti'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
49b5('bum): ba la gnas te/ kun 'byung ba myi dmyigs pa'i phyir ku rkyen 'byung ba'i shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
49b6('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ 'gog pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir 'gog pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
49b7('bum): phyi nad pa la gnas tedalam myi dmyigs pa'i phyiro lam shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas
49b8('bum): da zad pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir zad pa shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ myi skye ba myi
50a1('bum): dmyigs pa'i phyir myi skye ba shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ chos myi dmyigs
50a2('bum): pa'i phyir chos shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ gnyis su myed pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir
50a3('bum): gnyis su med pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ kun rdzob myi dmyigs pa'i phyir kun rdzob shes
50a4('bum): pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la/ gnas te/ 'dis pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir 'dris pa shes
50a5('bum): pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sgra ji bzhin myi dmyigs pa'i phyir sgra ji bzhin
50a6('bum): shes pa bsgom par bya'o// shi ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par spyod pa myi dmyigs pa'i
50a7('bum): phyir/ rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
50a8('bum): phyi nad pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa myed cing rnam par dpyod pa tsam myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa myed cing rnam par dpyod pa tsam gi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 
50b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa myed cing rnam par dpyod pa myed cing myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rtog pa med cing / 
50b2('bum): rnam par dpyod pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzind yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ yongs su
50b3('bum): ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ yongs su ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
50b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyind pa la gnas te/ kun shes pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir kun shes pa'i dbang po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 
50b5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te// kun/ shes pa rig pa'i dbang po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir kun
50b6('bum): pa rig pa'i dbong bu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rakyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ zil kyis
50b7('bum): gnond pa'i skye mched myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ zil du kyis genonang po'i skye mched yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
50b8('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyinang pa la gnas te/ mtha' dag skye mched myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ mtha' dag skye mched yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
51a1('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ dngos po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
51a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rnam par dgod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rnam par dgod pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
51a3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ so myi dmyigs pa'i phyir sa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
51a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinadapa la gnas te/ spyod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir spyod pa ba/ cu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byas
51a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pa lang tu phyind pa la gnas te/ bzod pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir bzod pa bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 
51a6('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ lhag po'i bsam pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa nyi shu yongs su rdzogs pa ri/ 
51a7('bum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen po'i ye shes myi dmyigs pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen/ 
51a8('bum): po'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sas dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shes pa myi dmyigs
51b1('bum): pa'i phyir zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shes pa bsgom par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ rigs
51b2('bum): pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir rigs pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha rA dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ 
51b3('bum): so so yang dag par rlog pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
51b4('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ mi 'jigs dpa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir myi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
51b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol phyinang po la gnas te/ ma nyams pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ ma nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga
51b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ pha rol tu phyind pa myi dmyigs
51b7('bum): pa'i phyir pha rold tu phyind pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas
51b8('bum): tete/ nor myi dmyigs po'i phyir nor bdun yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang po la gnas te/ rnam
52a1('bum): par myi rtog pa myi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
52a2('bum): rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ sems can gi gnas myi dmyigs pa'i phyir sems can gi gnas dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes
52a3('bum): rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la gnas te/ de'i bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mi dmyigs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub seMsaM
52a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nang pa la gnas te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa myi dmyig rnas pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su
52a5('bum): rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ byams pa chen po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir byams pa
52a6('bum): chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa lo gnas te/ snying rje chen po myi dmigs po'i phyir snying rje chen po yongs/ 
52a7('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ dga' ba chen po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir dga' bo chen po yongs su rdzogs
52a8('bum): par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la gnas te/ btang snyoms chen po myi dmyigs pa'i phyir btang snyoms chen po yongasasu rdzogs
52b1('bum): par bya'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson
52b2('bum): par bya'o// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bya'o// thams cad shes pa nyid
52b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la brtson par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa dang shes pa'i rnam pa
52b4('bum): shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bya'o// bag chags kyi 'tshoms sbyor ba'i nyon mongs
52b5('bum): pa thams cad spang bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson par bya ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
52b6('bum): chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyi nad pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
52b7('bum): tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos drang rang sangs rgyas kyis shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems cana'i chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sa
52b8('bum): rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la bslab par bya'o// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
53a1('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// mngon par shes pa drug la gnas par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab
53a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa rnam par g.yo ba shes par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
53a3('bum): tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ye shes zil kyis gan nad par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
53a4('bum): la bslab par bya'o// gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin gi sgo mang po thob par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la bslab par
53a5('bum): bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo sbyin pa gtong ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi 'ong ba dang ldan pa'i seMs
53a6('bum): bskyed pa gcig gis zil gis gnand par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa
53a7('bum): pi'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo tshul khrims srung ba thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gyis zil gyis gnand par 'dod pa'i
53a8('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams bzod pa bsgom
53b1('bum): bA thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis gan nad par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab/ 
53b2('bum): kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo brtson 'grus rtsom pa thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad
53b3('bum): rjes su yi rang ba dang / ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnand par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab/ 
53b4('bum): par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo bsam gtan la snyom/ ngas par 'jug pa thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams
53b5('bum): cad rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gci ga gyis zi lad kyis gan nad par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind
53b6('bum): pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bsgom par thams cad kyi dge pa'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad
53b7('bum): rjes su yi ring po dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis zil gis gan nad par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// 
53b8('bum): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems
54a1('bum): bskyed pa gcig gis zil gyis gnanang par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
54a2('bum): thams cad kyi bsam gtan dang / rnam par tha rad pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig gis gan nad par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems/ 
54a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin pa chung ngu sbyin yang thabs mkhas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
54a4('bum): du yongs su bsngo' ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na/ tshad myed krang myed dpag tu myed par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab
54a5('bum): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don tu tshul khrims chung ngu bsrungs kyang thabs mkhas pas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gis ji lta bur na
54a6('bum): tshad myod grangs myed dpag tu med par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslob par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don tu bzod pa
54a7('bum): chung ngu bsgoms kyang / thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na/ tshad myed pa gangs myed dpag tu myed par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems
54a8('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus chung ngu brtsams kyang thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ 
54b1('bum): du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na/ tshad myed grangs myed dpag tu myed par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par
54b2('bum): bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don du bsam gtan chung ngu mnyam par bzhag kyang thabs mkhas pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur na tshad myed gags myed/ 
54b3('bum): dpag tu myed par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyi don tu shes rab chung ngu bsgos
54b4('bum): kyang thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bsngo ba'i tshul gyis ji lta bur ni/ tshad myed grangs med par 'gyur snyam na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
54b5('bum): dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bsla ba par bya'o/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la
54b6('bum): gnas par 'dod pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rolang tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// 
54b7('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod/ 
54b8('bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang / bzod
55a1('bum): pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
55a2('bum): chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o/ 
55a3('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la spyod par 'dod pa dang / bsam gtan gi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs por
55a4('bum): bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang / ra' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod
55a5('bum): prer 'dod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ nad pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
55a6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ ji ltar ni tshe rabs thams cad du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi sku mthong bar 'gyur/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis bskul bar
55a7('bum): 'gyur/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis dgongs par 'gyur/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas mnyes par 'gyur/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas kyis yongs su gzung bar 'gyur snyam na yang shes rab kyi pha rol
55a8('bum): tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab
55b1('bum): par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myi chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// 
55b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpe' byad bzang po brgyad bcu thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan/ 
55b3('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tsha rabs thams cad du tshe rabs dran pa thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang
55b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems mi ngoster bar thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyinapa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
55b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpo'i spyod pa myi nyam par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
55b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po sdig to'i mdza' bo dang / sdi ga to'i grogs po thams cad spang bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ 
55b7('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad bsnyen bkur bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la
55b8('bum): bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud dang bdud kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha thams cad pham par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
56a1('bum): phyi nad pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyang bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
56a2('bum): pa la bslab por bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams can la bsgribs pa myed pa 'thob par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
56a3('bum): la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs su yongs su bsgrub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinang
56a4('bum): pa la bslab par bya'o// sha re dwa ti'i bu gzhan yong bya ngang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi ri gas bsgrub par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyinod pa
56a5('bum): la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dkon mchog gsu/ ma gi gdung myi 'chad pa'i don tu gnas par 'dod pas shes rab
56a6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ro dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhon nu'i sa thob par 'dod pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par/ 
56a7('bum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang myi 'bral bar 'dod pas shes kyi pha rol
56a8('bum): tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i sa las 'da' bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// 
56b1('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// 
56b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa la gang dang gang gyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / phu dud
56b3('bum): du bya ba dang / mchod par bya ba de lta bu'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / rnam pa de dag phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar dga' bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
56b4('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po se mas canaHthams cad yongs su dga' bar bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa/ 
56b5('bum): ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rtse na po sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind po la bslab par
56b6('bum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zas dang skom dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / me tog dang / gdug spos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal cha
56b7('bum): dang / stan dang / gnas dang / nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang / yo byad dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / lhab lhub dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bye dUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / sa le sbram dang
56b8('bum): dngul dang / bza' shing gi rab dang / rgyal po'i srid la sogs pa'i yo byad dang / longs spyod thams cad kyis sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par bya snyam na yang shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dpa
57a1('bum): la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs thams cad kyis 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sems can ji
57a2('bum): snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lame la dgod par 'dod pa'i dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba dang / sa
57a3('bum): rgyas dang / chos dang dge 'dun la mos pa thob pa la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten
57a4('bum): gi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas gtu dgas pa'i sems can thams cad theg pa chen po la gzung bar 'od dra pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la dgod par
57a5('bum): 'dod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'dod pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la dgod par 'dod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dgod par 'dod pa dang / 
57a6('bum): bsam gtan gi pha rold tu phyind pa la dgod par 'dod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la dgod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
57a7('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig 'ag yang snying po byang chub la nam 'dug gi bar du mi zad par bya bar 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la bslab par bya'o/ 
57a8('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa
57b1('bum): ngag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i
57b2('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol
57b3('bum): tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod
57b4('bum): par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// byang phyogs kyi phyogs 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
57b5('bum): dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa/ de dag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod par dga' bo'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha
57b6('bum): rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// byang shar gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad
57b7('bum): bdag gi yon tan brjod par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// sha rI phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rteni gi khams gang ga'i klung gi
57b8('bum): bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes kyi pha rol tu phyind pa
58a1('bum): la bslab par bya'o// lho nub gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad bdag gi yon tan
58a2('bum): brjod par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas
58a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// 'og gi phyogs
58a4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
58a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la bslab par bya'o// steng gi phye// gas kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed// dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de
58a6('bum): drag thams cad bdag gi yon tan brjod par dgo' ba'i byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi nad pa la bslab par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang shar phyogs
58a7('bum): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad du sems bskyed pa gcig gyis 'gro bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la blta bo par bya'o/ 
58a8('bum): lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag thams nad du sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'gro bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab sa/ 
58b1('bum): bya'o// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag thams cad du sems bskyed pa gcig gis 'gro bar 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
