166b2('bum): myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam par tha rad pa brgya de brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brten zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mthar kyis gnas
166b3('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// stong pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mtshan ma myed pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// smon pa
166b4('bum): myed pa brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mngon par shes pa rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro // ting nge 'dzin rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// 
166b5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu brtan zhes bya ba/ 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// mi 'jigs pa bzhi brtan zhes bya ba
166b6('bum): myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// byams pa chen po brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// snying rje chen po brtan zhes bya ba 'a
166b7('bum): myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lan cig
166b8('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi sbyor ro// dgra bcom pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rang byang chub brtan
167a1('bum): zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am mi brtan zhes bya bar myi sbyor ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brtan zhes bya ba 'am myi brtan pa zhe
167a2('bum): bya bar myi sbyor ro zhe/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// bam po bcu pa
167a3('bum): ka sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed/ 
167a4('bum): do// tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 'du shes yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi zhe 'du byed yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rnam
167a5('bum): par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// myig yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi skyo par myi 'byed do// rna ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'gyur
167a6('bum): do/ sna yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lce yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lus yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// yid yod ces bya ba'i
167a7('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// gzugs yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sgra yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// dri yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// ro// 
167a8('bum): yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// reg yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// chos yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// myig gi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya
167b1('bum): myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sna'i rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro// lce'i rnam par shes yod/ 
167b2('bum): ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lus gi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// yid gi rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed myig gi
167b3('bum): 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi/ 
167b4('bum): 'byed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lus gyi 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed/ yid gi 'dus te reg pa yod ces
167b5('bum): bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// myig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yod ces bya/ 
167b6('bum): 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 
167b7('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen kyis tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// ying gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gis tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sa'i khas yod ces
167b8('bum): bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// chu'i khams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ me'i khams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do// rlung gi khams yod ces bya ba 'am skye
168a1('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ nam mkha'i khams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do// rnam par shes pa'i khams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// ma rig pa yod ces byab
168a2('bum): 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do// 'du byed yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed de/ rnam par shes pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// mying dang gzugs yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces
168a3('bum): bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do/ skye mched drug yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// reg pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// tshor ba yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya ba myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 
168a4('bum): sred pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// len pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// srid pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do// skye ba yod ces bya ba'i myed ces bya
168a5('bum): bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rga shi yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya ba'i tshe slar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
168a6('bum): yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba 'am med ces bya bar gyi/ 
168a7('bum): sbyor myi 'byed do// bsam rten gi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// nang stong pa nyid yod zhes
168a8('bum): byi ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// phyi stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myi sbyor myi 'byed do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am skye
168b1('bum): ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// chen po stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod/ 
168b2('bum): bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed dode/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do thog ma
168b3('bum): dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya/ 
168b4('bum): byar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod ces/ bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// myi dmyi
168b5('bum): pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi skyer myi 'byed do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar gyi/ 
168b6('bum): sbyor myi 'byed do// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// dngas pa med pa'i ngo bo nying song pa nyid ya ces bya ba bya bar ma su sti 'byor ro// dran pa nye bar bzhag
168b7('bum): pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod ces bya 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor ro/ 
168b8('bum): po rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// stobs rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// byang chub gi yan lag/ yod ces bya ba 'i myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 'phags pa'i ye
169a1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// bsam rten rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor mi 'byed
169a2('bum): tshad myed pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi
169a3('bum): sbyor myi 'byed do// mthar gis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor gyi
169a4('bum): 'byed do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya ba ra myi sbyor myi 'byed do// gzungs gi sgo rnams yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya
169a5('bum): bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// so so yang dag par rig/ 
169a6('bum): pa bzhi yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// byams pa chen po yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// snying rje chen po yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
169a7('bum): papa bco brgyad yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi
169a8('bum): 'byed do// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rang byang chub yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// 
169b1('bum): lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod ces bya ba 'am myed ces bya bar myi sbyor myi 'byed do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ spyod
169b2('bum): ces bya bar yang myi dmyigs so// myi spyod ces bya bar yang myi dmyigs so// spyod kyang spyod la myi spyod kyang myi spyod ces bya bar myi dmyigs so// spyod pa yang ma yin myi spyod pa yang ma yin zhes bya bar yang myi dmyigs so// sha ra dwa
169b3('bum): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
169b4('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// tshul khrim das kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
169b5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// nang stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// phyi stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// phyi nang stong
169b6('bum): pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// chen po stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod nga/ don dam pa ste/ 
169b7('bum): pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin po la myi skya dang / ma
170a1('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi
170a2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi don
170a3('bum): du zhes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod de/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid gi don du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// dngos po myang ba stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod du/ 
170a4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// skye ba myed pa stong pa nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol
170a5('bum): tu byed pa ma myi sa dang / bkag pa myed pa stong pa nyid gi don du shesarab kyi phar long tu phyin pa la myi spyod de/ phyir myi ldog pa 'i sa'i don du shes rab kyi pha romang du phyin pa la myi spyod da sems
170a6('bum): yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la myi spyod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams kyi don du/ 
170a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams gi don du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// dang/ 
170a8('bum): bo rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ stobs rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod de/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// 'phags pa'i
170b1('bum): yan lag brgyad pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// bsam nyan rnams gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// chad med pa rjes
170b2('bum): gi don du shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// mthar gyis
170b3('bum): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa chu'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha ming tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// mngon par shes pa rnams gri ngan
170b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyad // ting nge 'dzin rnams gi ngan du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// gzungs gas rnams gdon du/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la myi spyad de/ deba'i/ 
170b5('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i don du/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// myi 'jigs pa bzhi'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu bya na pa la myi spyad do/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi'i don du/ shes rab
170b6('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod de/ byams pa chen po'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod de/ snying rje chen po'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyad do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gi don du shes pa/ 
170b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod de/ de bzhin nyid gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// chos gi dbyings gi don du shes rab gi pha rol du phyin pa 'i myi spya dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la myi
170b8('bum): spyong // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa ni chos gang la yang tha dad pa 'am bye brag gam khyad par du lta ba myed de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpal
171a1('bum): chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la brtson zhes bya'o// de lha'i myig ga don tu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la myi spyod do// lha'i rna ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do// gzhan gi
171a2('bum): sems shes pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do// sngon gi gnas dran pa'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la myi spyod do/ rdzu 'phrul gi rnam po'i don tu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la mi spyod do// zag pa zad pa'i ye shes
171a3('bum): kyi don tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la myi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong na/ byang chub sems dpa' lta ci smos te/ 
171a4('bum): rnam pa thams cad du thams cad mngon par shes pa dmyigs pa lta ga las 'ong / / sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu
171a5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa/ rnams la gnas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i
171a6('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji srid bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phu dung du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du myi sems so// bdag gyis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la
171a7('bum): gnas te/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim 'gror bya'o// bkur stir bya'o// phud dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// snyam du
171a8('bum): myi sems so// bdag gyis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na rba/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim 'gror bya'o// 
171b1('bum): bkur stir bya'o// phud dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du mi sems so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams grang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs
171b2('bum): pa de dag thams cad la rim 'gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phud dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// snyam du mi sems so// bdag gyis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ byang shar gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung
171b3('bum): gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phung dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// snyam du mi sems so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la gnas/ 
171b4('bum): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma ste/ de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed gzhugs pa de da dag thams cad la rim 'gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phud dud du bya'o/ 
171b5('bum): mchod par bya'o// snyam du mi sems so// bdag gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang rdza
171b6('bum): snyed gzugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phung dung du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du myi sems so// bdag gyis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams
171b7('bum): gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phung dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o snyam du myi sems so// bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams
171b8('bum): la gnas te/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya'o// phud dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// snyam du
172a1('bum): mi sems so// bdag gyis rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams la gnas te/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag thams cad la rim gror bya'o// 
172a2('bum): bkur bstir bya'o// phud dud du bya'o// mchod par bya'o// snyam du mi sems so// de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ji snyed ston pa de dag thams cad lha'i rna bas brnyan par bya'o// 'jig rten gi khams de dag gi sems can rnams
172a3('bum): kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o// de dag gi sngon gi gnas bdag gyis rjes su dran par bya'o// lha'i mig gis sems can de dag shi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / skyes par gyurar ba rnams bdag gyis mthong bar bya'o// sems can
172a4('bum): tshad med grangs med pa dag bag gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// snyam du myi sems te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes
172a5('bum): bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdud glags tshol zhing nyam sod pa rnams kyis kyang glags mi rnyed de/ 'jig rten pa dang / 'dzi/ 
172a6('bum): rten las 'das pa'i bya ba gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kyang lhund kyis grub pa dang / yongs su grub pa brtag pa med par 'grub po// 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu brtsal par/ 
172a7('bum): 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas
172a8('bum): kyi sar lcang du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha
172b1('bum): rnams dang / mangs su nye banagi lha rnams dang / ngas pa kun 'khor dang / changs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung sna dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snga dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / rlung ni
172b2('bum): dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams dang / kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig par chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo // 
172b3('bum): zhes yongs su bsrung bar byed do// de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad
172b4('bum): la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// lce phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji ste de bzhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan
172b5('bum): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lcang du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams dang / mtshe ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul/ 
172b6('bum): dbang byed gi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge/ 
172b7('bum): ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che dang / mchi ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems/ 
172b8('bum): dpa' chen po de la la la zhig par chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
173a1('bum): byang nu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed ba 'byor ro// nu phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i drung gi bye ma sred dag na/ sas rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang skyid bzhugs pa/ 
173a2('bum): de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo // zhes yongs su bsrung badzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan pa
173a3('bum): 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge/ 
173a4('bum): dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub seMs
173a5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig par chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung bar byed do// de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig/ yod pa de dag kyang che 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// 
173a6('bum): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
173a7('bum): ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyisar lhung du 'ong ngo // zhes pa yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gau lnga rnams dang / mche ma dang / 
173a8('bum): dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / batshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang / 
173b1('bum): dang dge ba dang / rlung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / michi bdang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gi lha rnams
173b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig par chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na
173b3('bum): de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir 'o// byang shar gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang
173b4('bum): ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong ngo zhes yodas su bsrung ba badzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gri
173b5('bum): lha rnams dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang
173b6('bum): chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong
173b7('bum): ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og myin gi lnga rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig par chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang che 'di
173b8('bum): nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// shar phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams
174a1('bum): cagagang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar ltung du 'ong ba zhes yongs su
174a2('bum): srung ba sa // rgyal ba chen po bani dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum dang / mchi ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dag dang / gzhan 'phrul dang byed// kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / chu lha ban dang / tshas rdzun
174a3('bum): 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / sdang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad myed snang ba dang / kun snang dang sha dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshod med chi ba dang / 'bras bu che ba
174a4('bum): mche ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la lo la zhig par chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba
174a5('bum): byed do// de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'din nga la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de na 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams
174a6('bum): thad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rtanang gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji srid bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dang
174a7('bum): chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung du 'ong zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrun
174a8('bum): dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung deg dang / tshad med
174b1('bum): dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
174b2('bum): chen po de la la la zhig par chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo // zhes nga yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
174b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams glang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
174b4('bum): bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan tho rdzas kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ljang du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bskye nga ba byed do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gri lha rnams
174b5('bum): dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed// gri lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshang sa lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang / 
174b6('bum): dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang
174b7('bum): shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gi lha rnams can kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig par chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyon tu bya ba grang
174b8('bum): ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad myed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad lo byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// 
175a1('bum): 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig zhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar lhung
175a2('bum): du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams dang / mche ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye phan/ 
175a3('bum): dadang/ tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang / chung deg dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / 
175a4('bum): mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og mi/ rten gyi lha rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// 
175a5('bum): de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du tham sa cad med par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed
175a6('bum): pa'i phyir ro// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed bzhugs pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
175a7('bum): ltu du 'ong zhes yongs su bsrung ba mdzad do// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha rnams dang / mtshem dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang / tshangs lha nye \u0f7f
175a8('bum): gi lha rnams dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / snang ba dang / chung snang dang / tshad med snang ba dang / kun snang dang ba dang / dge ba dang chung dge dang / tshad med dge ba dang / dge rgyas dang / che ba dang / chung che dang / tshad med che ba dang / 'bras bu che/ 
175b1('bum): kha dang / mi che ba dang / mi gdung ba dang / shin tu mthong ba dang / gya nom snang ba dang / 'og min gyi lha rnams dang / kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig par chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung ba byed do// de la lus kyi skyon tu
175b2('bum): bya ba gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang tshe 'di nyid la thams cad du thams cad med par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i
175b3('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i gzungs kyi sgo
175b4('bum): dang / ting nge 'dzin gi sgo dang / spobs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa'i sgo dag kyang tshegs mi che bar mngon tu 'gyur ro// skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes
175b5('bum): par byed par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon/ par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan pa// ngas de dag nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyur ro// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang/ 
175b6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du chos gang la la chos rnams dang 'du ba 'am 'bral bar 'a gyur ram/ 'phrang ba 'am/ mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yod dam zhes bya/ 
175b7('bum): bar mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos gang 'du ba 'am 'bral bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'phrad par 'am mi 'phrad par 'gyur ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
175b8('bum): po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du bdag gyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs
176a1('bum): par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/ 'on tam myi 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa med do// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do/ 
176a2('bum): mngon par rdzogs par 'gyur ba med 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// shwa ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
176a3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe chos gang yang chos kyi dbyings dang tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
176a4('bum): de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i/ bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi dbyings dang chos rnams su bye brag tu bya ba mi byed de
176a5('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni 'di snyam du chos kyi dbyings khong du chud par
176a6('bum): 'gyur ram/ 'on tam khong du chud par mi 'gyur zhes bya bar mi sems te/ de ni 'di ltar des chos kyi dbyings gang gyis chos gang khong du chud par bya ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do// de yang 'di ltar de ni chos kyi dbyings
176a7('bum): stong zhes bya bar mi sbyor/ mi stong zhes bya bar mo sbyor ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sos/ 
176a8('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su mi sbyor ro// tshor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang tshor bar mi sbyor ro// 'du shes dang / stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang 'du
176b1('bum): shes su myi sbyor ro// 'du byed dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor stong pa nyid dang 'du byed du myi sbyor ro// rnam par shes pa dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rnam par shes par myi sbyor ro// myig dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang myig tu myi sbyor ro// 
176b2('bum): rna ba dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna bar myi sbyor ro// sna dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sngar myi sbyod ro// lce dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lcer myi sbyor ro// lus dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus su myi sbyor
176b3('bum): ro/ yid dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid du myi sbyor ro// gzugs dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs su myi sbyor ro// sgra dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa dang sgrar myi sbyor ro// dri dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid
176b4('bum): dang drir myi sbyor ro// ro dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang ror myi sbyor ro// reg dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg du myi sbyor ro// chos dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos su myi sbyor ro// myig gi khams dang stong pa nyid/ 
176b5('bum): du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang myig gi khams su myi sbyor ro// gzugs kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang gzugs kyi khams su myi sbyor ro// myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa phra nyid du myi sbyor bstong/ 
176b6('bum): stong pa nyid dang myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro// rna ba'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i khams su myi sbyor ro// sgo'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sgra'i khams su myi sbyor ro// 
176b7('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro// sna'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sna'i khams su myi sbyor ro// dri'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong
176b8('bum): pa nyid dang dri'i khams su myi sbyor ro// sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro// lce'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lce'i khams su myi sbyor ro// ro
177a1('bum): khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor stong pa nyid dang / ro'i khams su myi sbyor/ lus kyi khams dang / stong pa nyid du mi sbyor ro// stong pa nyid dang lus kyi khams su myi sbyor ro// reg bya'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang reg bya'i// 
177a2('bum): khams su myi sbyor ro// lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du mi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro// yid kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi khams su myi sbyor ro// chos
177a3('bum): kyi khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang chos kyi khams su myi sbyor ro// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang stong pa nyid du myi sbyor/ stong pa nyid dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su myi sbyor ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa tini
177a4('bum): bu 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor de la 'di ni rnal 'byor dam pa ste/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar myi lhung ngo // sangs
177a5('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// sems can rnams kyang yongs su smra na par byed do// bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang myur tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu rnal 'byor tu bya ba gang
177a6('bum): ji yang rung ste/ de dag gi nang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor de ni rab ces bya/ mchog ces bya/ dam pa zhes bya/ phul zhes bya/ gtso bo zhes bya/ gya nom pa zhes bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes
177a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i rnal 'byor te/ bla na myed pa'i rnal 'byor to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung
177a8('bum): bstan pa zhes bya ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar gyur pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can tshad myed grangs myed pa'i don byed kyang de 'di snyam du bdag
177b1('bum): ni shes rab kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa la brtson pa zhe 'am/ brtson pa ma yin no zhes bya bar myi sems so// bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lung bston pa mdzad do// bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur to// bdag gyis ni
177b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spong bar bya'o// bdag gyis ni sems can yongs su smin par bya'o// bdag gyis ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o// snyam du myi sems
177b3('bum): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la bye brag tu 'byed pa myed do// de na chos kyi dbyings las chos gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod dam/ gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis lung gang bstan par
177b4('bum): bya ba 'am/ gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar de lta bu'i chos gzhan gang yang yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
177b5('bum): po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag gi 'du shes myi skye/ 'o// sems can gi 'du shes myi skye'o// srog gi 'du shes myi skye'o// 'gro ba'i 'du shes mi skye'o// gso ba'i 'du shes myi skye'o// skyes bu'i 'du
177b6('bum): shes mi skye'o// gang zag gi 'du shes myi skye'o// shed can gi 'du shes dang mi skye'o// shed bdag gi 'du shes myi skye'o// byed pa po'i 'du shes myi skye'o// tshor ba po'i 'du shes myi skye'o// shes pa po'i 'du shes mi skye'o// mthong ba po'i 'du
177b7('bum): shes myi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sems can shin tu skye ba myed cing 'gag pa myed pa'i phyir te/ sems can la ni skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed de/ gang la skye ba myed pa dang / 'gag pa myed pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ 
177b8('bum): phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes
178a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can myi dmyigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dben pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can rang bzhin
178a2('bum): myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can ngo bo nyid myed pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa
178a3('bum): ste/ 'di ltar stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor to// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnal 'byor da te/ de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor de rnams zild kyis mnand te
178a4('bum): gnas so// sha dwa ti'i bu rnal 'byor de 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu/ mngon par bsgrub po// mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par/ 
178a5('bum): rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgya sa kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad mngon par bsgrub po// sha ra dwa ti 'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnal 'byor de 'di la
178a6('bum): spyod pa ni ser sna'i sems myi skyed do// tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems myi bskyed do// gnod par sems pa'i sems dang le lo'i sems dang / 'khrug pa'i sems dang / shes rab 'cha la pa'i sems myi skyed do// de skad ces bkra
178a7('bum): stsal pa dang / sha ra dwa ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor de 'dis spyod pa de gang
178a8('bum): nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa lags/ 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
178b1('bum): phyin pa'i rnal 'byor da 'dis rnam par spyod pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa lags// dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang myi'i nang nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o// 
178b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas shi 'phos te/ 'dir skyes pa de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la myur tu 'grub pa
178b3('bum): ste/ tshe rabs 'das nas kyang chos zab mo 'di dag de dag la mngon tu 'gyur ro// de nas kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor de la mnyam par gzhog go// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang
178b4('bum): na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu yang skye bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
178b5('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang bsnyen bkur bye/ da par 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de la byang chub sems da/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ldan kyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phro
178b6('bum): nas 'dir skyes pa de ni tshe gcig gis thogs pa ste/ de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa myed do// gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin kyi sgo thams cad kyang der ma 'dus pa
178b7('bum): myed de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang myi'i nang nas shi 'phos nas myi dang skal pa mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni phyir myi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
178b8('bum): dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul ba ma yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor de la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa yin no// de la gzungs kyi sgo dang / ting nge 'dzin
179a1('bum): kyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du 'gyur ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang khyod kyis de skad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di/ 
179a2('bum): la snyoms par 'jug pa de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang tu skye bar 'gyur/ zhes smras pa ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas shi 'phos
179a3('bum): nas gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas der 'gro ste/ nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
179a4('bum): rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bco ma ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar myi 'gyuraro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
179a5('bum): po thabs la myi mkhas pa dag bsam gtan dang po la ya nga mnyam par gzhog/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la ya nga mnyam par gzhig nas/ sangs bsam gtan gsu
179a6('bum): pa la yang mnyam par gzhog/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang mnyam pur gzhog cing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad de/ de dag byasamu gtan thob pas lha tshe rings po'i nang du skyes shing gal
179a7('bum): te myi'i nang du skye ba thob nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag la bsnyen bkur byed na yang dri dag dbang po rtulo zhing dpung po myi rno ba yang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
179a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprad de/ de dag thabs la myi mkhas pas bsam gtan rnams
179b1('bum): spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang rtul ba yin te dbang po rna ba ma yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar
179b2('bum): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms
179b3('bum): par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang
179b4('bum): snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' ya sa skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang sgo mas pur 'jug/ cung zad
179b5('bum): myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes mye 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug
179b6('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dbang po lnga la yang snyom sa par 'jug/ stobs lnga la yang snyoms par 'jug byeng
179b7('bum): chub kyi yan lag lnga yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ ste/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan gyi
179b8('bum): dbang gis myi skye/ tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i dbang gyis myi skye/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mya skye/ ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang na bzhugs zhes/ 
180a1('bum): 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag du skye bar 'gyur ba yod do// de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byorang dung nam yang ma bral bsu bskal da bya bzang po 'di nyid la bla na myed pa ya/ 
180a2('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan
180a3('bum): gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsamu gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying
180a4('bum): rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms pa ra 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 
180a5('bum): rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'ju/ ga/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'ju ga/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yang smos
180a6('bum): par 'jug cing de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis myi skye'o// de dag ni phyir 'dod pa'i khams 'dir skyes kyang rgyal rigs che zhing / 
180a7('bum): mtho bo'i rigs su skye'o// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o/ khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye ra/ ste/ de yang srid pa la brkam pa'i phyir ma yin gyi sems can yongs su
180a8('bum): smin par bya ba'i phyir ro// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bas mo gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsum pa yang / 
180b1('bum): snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang snyoms par 'jug/ btang
180b2('bum): snyoms la yang snyams par 'jug/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad myed pa'i skye
180b3('bum): mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myini skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cing de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug
180b4('bum): pa'i dbang gis myi skye ba yang yod de/ de dag ni rgyal podan po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang bskal pa mnyam par skye'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par/ 
180b5('bum): skye'o// mtshe ma'i lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// dga' ldan kyi lha rnams dang bskal pa mnyam par skye'o// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams drang skal ba mnyam par skye'o
180b6('bum): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye'o// de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// 
180b7('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mnyes par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhung yongs su dag par byed do/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
180b8('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag thabs mkhas pas bsam gtan dang po la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan gsuM
181a1('bum): pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams bra la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' ba la yang
181a2('bum): snyoms par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung za
181a3('bum): myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ pa yod de/ de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten tu skye'o// 
181a4('bum): de dag de na yang tshangs pa tshangs chen dbang po dang ldan pa brgya phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gi nang na ma chog dam pa phul du bya bar gyur te/ de dag de ni 'khod
181a5('bum): cing gang na de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag gi/ ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon par sangs rgyas shing / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba bzhugs pa de lta bu'i/ 
181a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tu rgyu zhing 'dong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa drugra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don tu
181a7('bum): gsol ba gang pa par byed do// shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a chen po che gcig gis thogs pags rab kyi rob tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag babs papa/ 
181a8('bum): pas bsam gtan dang po la yang stobs par 'dug/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la yang sems pa 'dug se byams gtan gsum pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ thos ma gtan bani sa
181b1('bum): yang snyoms par 'jug/ byams pa la yang snyoms par 'jug/ snying rje la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dga' bo la yang sems par 'jug/ btang snyoms la yang snyoms par 'jug/ nam ma/ 
181b2('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ 'du shes myed 'du shes
181b3('bum): myed myin skye mched la yang snyoms par 'jug/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la yang yongs su bsgom/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi lo yang yong su bsgom/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang yongs
181b4('bum): suM bsgom/ dbang po lnga la yang yongs su bsgom/ stobs lnga nga la yang yongs su bsgom/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la ste rang yongs su bsgom/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
181b5('bum): la yang yongs su bsgom/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang snyoms par 'ju/ ga cing de dag gi dbang gis myi skye ba yang yod de/ de dag
181b6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mngon du gyur pa rnams bsnyen bkur zhing de dag tu tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod de/ dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye'o// de dag der tshe'i tshul bzhin du gnas
181b7('bum): nas dbang po ma nyams pa dang dran zhing shes bzhin du lnga bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te/ mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon/ 
181b8('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs dag tu chos kyi 'khor lo ba dag kyang yod do// 
182a1('bum): bam po bcu gcig pa'o// / sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob
182a2('bum): pa dga'i dod pa'i khams su yang myi skye/ gzugs kyi khams su yang myi skye/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su yang myi skye bar de dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
182a3('bum): rgyas rnams la rim gro dang bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tu 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'
182a4('bum): sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag mang na par shes pa drug po de dag gis rnam par brtse zhing sang nas rgyas kyi zhing gang na theg pa chen po ma gtogs par nyan thos
182a5('bum): kyi theg pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mya ga/ ga pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tu 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang
182a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par brtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na sems can rnams kyi tshe dpag tu myed pa de lta bu'i
182a7('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa dag 'jig rten gyi
182a8('bum): khams gang na/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra yang myi grag pa dang / chos kyi sgra myi grag pa dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra myi grag pa de lta bu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing sangs rgyas
182b1('bum): kyi legs pa brjod/ chos kyi legs pa brjod/ dge 'dun gi legs pa brjod pas/ sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems dang bar 'gyur te/ 
182b2('bum): gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dag du skye bar 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems skyed
182b3('bum): phyin chad bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad myed pa bzhi dang / gzug sa myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba byi
182b4('bum): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs/ lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
182b5('bum): bcu dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / sra so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag kyang thob nas/ 
182b6('bum): de dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mya skye/ gzugs kyi khams su yang myi skye/ gzugs myed pa'i khams su yang myi skye zhing / de dag tu yang sems can rnams kyi don byed pa yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bri/ 
182b7('bum): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin po drug la spyod pa dag/ dang po sems bskyod pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas phyir myi ldog
182b8('bum): 'i sa 'thob pa yang yod de// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
183a1('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / mngon par sangs rgyas nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can grangs myed tshad myed pa'i don byas nas/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
183a2('bum): dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am bskal pa'i lhag mar gnas pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'ang
183a3('bum): lhor yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing / de ltar byang chub sems dpa' ses
183a4('bum): dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas pa com ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang / sems can yongasu smyin par bya/ 
183a5('bum): ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasasu dag par bya ba'i do// na du 'dong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chubasems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin
183a6('bum): pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa dgra/ bsam gtan dang / tshad myed pa dang gzugs myed pa'o
183a7('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis tshul du mas rnam par brtse zhing / 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go// de dag bsam gtan dang po las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyos
183a8('bum): par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas nya bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ bsam gtan gnyis pa las langs nas
183b1('bum): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nas/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan gsum pa/ 
183b2('bum): langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa langs nas/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go// bsam gtan bzhi
183b3('bum): las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'ju ga pa la mnyam par gzhog go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las le ngus nas nam mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug
183b4('bum): nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gro/ ga pa'i snyems par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug po las langs nas/ rnam shes
183b5('bum): mtha' yas skye mched la snyomos par 'jug go/ rnam shi sa mtha' yas skye mched las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go// 'gog pa'i snyoms par
183b6('bum): 'jug pa las langs nas/ cung zad myed pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go// cung zad myed pa'i skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ 
183b7('bum): 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las langs nos 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched la ya snyoms par 'jug go/ 'du shes myed 'du shes myed myin skye mched las langs nas/ 'gog pa'i/ 
183b8('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog go/ shwa ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams
184a1('bum): bsam gtan dang / chang med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang tu rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang / 
184a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi thob pa/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi thob pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi thob pa/ dbang po lnga thob pa/ stobs lnga thob pa/ byang
184a3('bum): chub kyi yan lag bdun thob pa/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa thob pa/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thob pa/ bsam gtan rnams thob pa/ tshad myed pa rnams thob pa/ gzugs myed pa'i
184a4('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa rnams thob pa/ rnam par thar pa ba rgyad thob pa/ mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu thob pa/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma myed pa dang smon pa myed pa/ 
184a5('bum): thob pa/ mngon par shes pa rnams thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin rnams tho ba pa/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa
184a6('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa byizhi thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad thob pa dag/ rnam par thar pa'i sgro ga sum thob kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed ldan
184a7('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par myi byed/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob par myi byed/ rang byang chub thob par myi byed kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spro/ 
184a8('bum): cing / thabs mkhas pas yongs su bzung bas/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa sems can rnams la yongs su ston par byed de/ sems can de dag des rgyun tu zhugs pa'i
184b1('bum): 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / phyir mya 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang / dag bcom pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / rang byang chub thob/ 
184b2('bum): par 'gyur bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob pan bya ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod
184b3('bum): pa yin te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni phyir myi ldog pa yin par shes par bya/ 
184b4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing // dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang yod de/ sha ra/ 
184b5('bum): dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de da ga ni bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po / 
184b6('bum): rab kyi pha rolod tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ bsam gtan bzhi thob pa/ tshad myed pa bzhi thob pa/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob pa/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum bcu rtsa bdun
184b7('bum): thob pa/ mngon par shes pa drug thob pa/ de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i stobs bcu thob pa/ myi 'jigs pa bzhi thob pa/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
184b8('bum): pa bco brgyad thob pa dag/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi thob pa khong du chud par bya ba'i don du spyod kyang bden pa bzhi gtogs par myi byed pa dag yod de/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i seMs
185a1('bum): dpa' chen po de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogs par shes par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag 'jig rten
185a2('bum): kyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dong zhing de dag gi sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par bskul bar byed kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yong su dag par byed pa dag kyang yod de/ sha ra dwa ti
185a3('bum): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa grangs myed tshad myed pas bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang
185a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin rab drug la gnas shing sems can rnams kyi don du rtag par ba rtson te/ nam yang gnod par 'gyur ba'i tshig myi smra/ gnod pa dang / 
185a5('bum): ljon pa'i lus kyi las dang / yid kyi las myi byed pa dag kyi/ nga yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas ni/ 
185a6('bum): sems can gi don du rtag tu brtson pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'do ba'i sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi las gsum po rgyun gcod pa dag kyang yod de/ shar dwa ti / 
185a7('bum): byams dpa' sems dpa da ga la ga sbyin sa kyi du sa// sa pan dusas kyi do ma drug
185a8('bum): mi ru ba rgya tsho ba'i 'ad pa rnams la las dang gis dod pa na mamis ni sa nga na rnams sa dzin pa ga ga da pa mam to ni
185b1('bum): la spos dang / 'phreng ba 'dod pa rnams la 'phreng ba dang / byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang / mal stan 'dod pa rnams la mal stan dang / gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang / rgyan 'dod pa rma/ 
185b2('bum): la rgyan dang / 'thab 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba dang / khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim kyis yong su spyad cing 'gyu ba'i yo byad skyon myed pa rnams yongs su bsgrub pa dag kyang yod do// sho ra dwa ti
185b3('bum): 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / tshul khrims kyi pha rolang tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams la lus dang reg dang / 
185b4('bum): yid kyi las sdom pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// shar dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems pan+d+ha chen gyi drug la gnas shing / bzod pa'i pha rolang tu phyin
185b5('bum): myur byas te/ sems can rnams la khong khro ba myed gnod sems myed pa la rab tu 'god bu dag kyang me ji rA d+hU ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
185b6('bum): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams dge ba'i chos thams cad la mngon por brtson pa la rab tu 'god pa
185b7('bum): kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ sems can rnams
185b8('bum): la zhi gnas rtse gcig tu bya ba dang / 'dod pa rnams la dben pa la rab tu 'god pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rold tu
186a1('bum): phyin pa drug la gnas shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lhur byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku ji 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul te/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems
186a2('bum): rnams dang / byol song gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams la ngan song thams cad las yang dag par bzla ba'i phyir chos ston pa dag kyang
186a3('bum): yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rold tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi sku ji 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par sprul
186a4('bum): nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi/ bye ma snyed dag du dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos/ ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnas la snyen kur byed pa/ 
186a5('bum): dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sang sa rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma/ 
186a6('bum): yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni
186a7('bum): gcig gis thogs pa sha sdug skyo bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang go'i krung gyi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de ni
186a8('bum): gshegs pa rnams pa bzhin babyor byed pa dang / choms nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas kyiman tan rnam par phyi ba dag kyang yong bar byed cing/ de dag sa sa rgyas
186b1('bum): kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongasasu bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du byang chub sems dpa' ses/ 
186b2('bum): dpa' chen po che gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung kyi bye me dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos smon pa/

186b4('bum): dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan de dug gi mtshan yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par tu 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongasu bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas
186b5('bum): kyi zhing de dag du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen kho tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa da ga kyang yod do// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga
186b6('bum): 'i klungad kyi bye ma snyed dag du dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ste na pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sang+ga/ 
186b7('bum): rgyas kyi zhing kyi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongasu bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
186b8('bum): zhing mang po yongasu bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// byang shar kyi phyogs
187a1('bum): 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung kyi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byad/

187a3('bum): 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gris thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// 
187a4('bum): shar lde'i phyogs 'tshams kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnaMs la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa' rga
187a5('bum): 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kya mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi/ mtshan ma yongasu bzung ste/ de bas kyang khyad par du 'phags pa'i
187a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dge du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis the/ gas pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshas
187a7('bum): kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing / sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa'i dge
187a8('bum): 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rna bar phye ba dag tu mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yong su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par tu 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi

187b7('bum): nyan cing byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan na par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing / de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yong su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che

188a1('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / chos nyan cing

188a3('bum): 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongasu bsgrub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// 
188a4('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ myi chen po'i mtsha na sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par byas te/ dbang po gsal
188a5('bum): zhing yongs su dag pa dang ldan par gyur nas/ de dag lus yod/ su dag pa de dag gis skye bo mang po dga' ba dang / mos pa// bskyed de/ de dag 'gro ba mang po'i snying tu sdug cing yid du 'ong bar
188a6('bum): sems can de dag kyang sems mas par gyur pa'i dge bya'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis mthar kyis thag pa gsuM gis yongasu mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sas
188a7('bum): dpa' chen pos de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o// ngag yongasu dag pa la bslab par bya'o// yid yongasu dag po la bslab par bya'o// shar
188a8('bum): 'ibu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba thob nas/ de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis bdag myi bstod
188b1('bum): gzhan myi smod pa dag yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
188b2('bum): pa la gnas shing / phyir myi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar tu nam yang dbul bar myi 'gyur zhing log par myi 'gro ba dang / ngan song du myi ltung ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub
188b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed phyin chad phyir myi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi la myi gtong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang
188b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol ratu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gan sa shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur na/ de dag dge bcu
188b5('bum): 'i las kyi la rnams la sems can rnams rab tu 'god pa da/ nga / sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pa dang / sems can yongasu smra/ da pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub
188b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid yongasu bzung ste/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal sri/ 
188b7('bum): brgya srang du mu la gnas shing / de dag la gnas nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes par byed de/ sangs rgyas bco ldan 'das de dag la yo byad thams cad dang mchod pa sna tshogs
