188b8('bum): kyis rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing
189a1('bum): sems can rnams log par lta ba'i mun pa can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyis snang bar byed pa dang / bdag nyid kyis kyang nam bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu meng// 
189a2('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar tu sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang nam yang 'bral bar myi byed pa dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi tshe/ 
189a3('bum): la yang dag par 'byung ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus
189a4('bum): kyi las dang ngag dang / yid kyi las rnams kyi gau mya 'byed do// da skad ces bka' stsald pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i dbus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// 
189a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chu na po'i lus kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang leg sa/ ngag gi las khu na mA tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags
189a6('bum): yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du sems shing / 'drin
189a7('bum): lus yin gyis des ni lus kyi las shig rtsa ma/ 'di ni ngag yin gyis des ni ngag gi las shig brtsam/ 'di ni yid yin gis des ni yid kyi las shig brtsam snyam na yang de ni sha ra dI ti/ 
189a8('bum): 'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
189b1('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni lus dang / ngag gang dang / yid kyi las gang gis 'jungs pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ tshul khrims ngan pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ gnod sems kyi sems bskyed pa/ 
189b2('bum): 'am/ le lo'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ 'khrug pa'i sems bskyed pa 'am/ shes rab 'chal po'i sems bskyed par bya ba'i de lta bu'i lus myi dmyigs so// ngag myi dmyigs so// ses
189b3('bum): myi dmyigs so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len bskyed pa dang / ngag gi gnas
189b4('bum): ngan len bskyed pa dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len bskyed pa tsam du ni shes rwa myi bya ste de ni gnas myed do// de ci'i phyirazhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'
189b5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len yongs su skyo// ngo // ngag gi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ngo // yid
189b6('bum): sde na sa su rlung rgyu mas sums na rje kyi sa sa sa
189b7('bum): gong yid kyi las kha nu ma tho bo myed pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len yongasu spyong ba lags/ ngag gi
189b8('bum): gnas ngan len yongasu sbyong ba lags/ yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
190a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus myi dmyigs/ ngag myi dmyigs/ sems myi dmyigs na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas pa/ 
190a2('bum): len yongs su sbyong ba yin/ ngag gi gnas ngan len yongasu sbyong ba yin/ yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen
190a3('bum): po sems dang po bskyed phan chad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas shing nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa myed par de rtag tu rgyun myi
190a4('bum): 'chad par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i se mas nye bar gzhog na/ de ni byang chub seMs da pa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi gnas ngan len dang ngag gi gnas ngan len
190a5('bum): dang / yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba zhes pa/ sa bshad do// sha rA dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' / sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
190a6('bum): byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson
190a7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dag kyang yod do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byung chub
190a8('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
190b1('bum): me/ nas lus la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / ngag la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / yid la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu/ 
190b2('bum): phyin pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyi
190b3('bum): pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa la dmyigs pa myed pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la dmyigs pa myed pa
190b4('bum): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la dmyigs pa mye dad pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thegapa la dmyigs pa myed par 'gyur ba de ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
190b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la dmyigs pa myed cing / blang ba myed po dang / dor ba myed pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
190b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam de lta bus pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod cing nan tan du byed pa de dag ni sus kyang thub pa myed do// gsol dra pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' seMs da
190b7('bum): chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa rnams thub pa ma mchis po lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la
190b8('bum): spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs la rlom sems myed pa dang / tshor ba la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'du shes la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'du byed la rlom sems myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa la rlo mo sems
191a1('bum): myed pa dang // myig dang gzugs la rlom sems myed pa dang / rna ba dang sgra la rlom sems myed pa dang / sna dang dri la rlom sems myed pa dang / lce dang re la rlom sems myed pa dang / lus dang / 
191a2('bum): bya la rlom sems myed pa dang / yid dang chos la rlom sems myed pa dang / sa'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / chu'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / mye'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang rlung
191a3('bum): gi khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / nam mkha'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khas la rlom sems myed pa dang / myig gi khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / gzugs
191a4('bum): kyi khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / myig gi rnam par shes pa'i khas la rlom sems myed pa dang / rna ba'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / sgra'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / 
191a5('bum): 'i rnam par shes pani rnams pa rlom sems myed pa dang / sna'i khams la rlom sems myed pa dang / dri'i khams la rdzon si mus myed pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams ma
191a6('bum): sna sa sas rnaMm sa sa nga/ sbyi gas pa sa snas sas sa
191a7('bum): kyi ma sa kyi sa su sa kyi sa pa sa swAhA/ 
191b1('bum): pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / 
191b2('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la rlom
191b3('bum): sems myed pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la rjem/ 
191b4('bum): sems myed pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed/ rab dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems mye
191b5('bum): pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid la rlom sem/ sa myed pa dang / dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / 
191b6('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa stong pa
191b7('bum): pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la rloms su myed pa dang / dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang
191b8('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi li rlom sems myed pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / dbang po lnga la rlom sems myed pa dang / stobs lnga la rlom sems myed pa dang byang chub
192a1('bum): kyi yan lag bdun la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / bsam gtan
192a2('bum): bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / tshad myed pa bzhi lo rlom sems myed pa dang / gzugs myed pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la rlom sems myed pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la rlom sems myed pa dang
192a3('bum): mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la rlom sas myed pa dang / stong pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / mtshan ma myed pa la rlom sems myed pa dang / smon pa myed pa la rlom sems myed pa
192a4('bum): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la rlom sems myed pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la rlom sems myed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la rlom sems myed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
192a5('bum): bcu la rlom sems myed pa dang / myi 'jigs pa bzhi la/ rlom sems myed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la/ rlom sems myed pa dang / byams pa chen po la rlom sems myed
192a6('bum): pa dang / snying rje chen po la rlom sems myed pa dang / sang sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rlom sems myed pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la rlom sems myed pa dang / lan cig/ 
192a7('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems myed pa dang / phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la rlom sems myed pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / rang byang chub la rlom ses myed pa dang / lam gyi
192a8('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid la rlom sems myed pa dang / bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rlom sems myed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par la rlom sems myed par gyur pa de'i tshe/ byang / 
192b1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel ba yin te/ sus kyang thub pa myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
192b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed cing / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas nam yang ngan song rnams su myi skye/ myi dbul zhing 'phongs
192b3('bum): pa nyams su myong bar myi 'gyur te/ lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang / myi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i nang na smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par myi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do// de nas
192b4('bum): tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan
192b5('bum): song rnams su skye bar myi 'gyur ba dang // myi dbul zhing 'a phongs pa nyams su myong bar myi 'gyur ba dang / lus gang da// nga ldan pas lha dang / myi dang lha ma yin gri nang nas smad par 'gyur/ 
192b6('bum): ba de lta bu'i lus yong su 'dzin par myi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyend pa'i ye shes de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis be ka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
192b7('bum): chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung / 
192b8('bum): kyi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
193a1('bum): ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed
193a2('bum): kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas
193a3('bum): ni/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi'i klud kyi bye ma snyed dag kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// 
193a4('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon ta ngan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' se mas dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang phyogs
193a5('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin ga shegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang nyes rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo / chos kyang nyan/ 
193a6('bum): tote// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub ses dpa' sems de pa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs
193a7('bum): 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang
193a8('bum): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ shar lho'i phyogs 'tshas
193b1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub
193b2('bum): sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams
193b3('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// byang chub seMs
193b4('bum): dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sos dpa' sems dpa' chen do pa ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ nub byang gi phyogs 'tsham/ 
193b5('bum): gi 'jig rten gi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kya
193b6('bum): nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rno bar phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ 'og
193b7('bum): gi phyogs gi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas glang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos kyang nyan to// 
193b8('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ steng gi phyogs
194a1('bum): kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo // chos
194a2('bum): nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo // ye shes de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas
194a3('bum): kyi 'du shes myi skyed do// chos kyi 'du shes myi skyed do// dge 'dun gi 'du shes myi skyed do// nyan thos kyi 'du shes myi bskyed do// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes myi skyed do// byang chub sems dpa'i 'du
194a4('bum): shes myi skyed do/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes myi skyed do// bdag gi 'du shes myi skyed do// gzhan gi 'du shes myi skyed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes myi skyed do// ye shes de lta bu
194a5('bum): dang ldan pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa myi dmyig so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ 
194a6('bum): spyod de/ tshul khrims kyi pha rold tu phyin pa mya dmyigaso/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ bzod pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa myi dmyigs so// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
194a7('bum): spyod de/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa myi dmyigs so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod de/ bsam gtan kyi pha rold tu phyin pa myi dmyigs so// shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
194a8('bum): tu phyin pa la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa myi dmyigs so/ nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// phyi stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// 
194b1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom ste phyi nang stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste stong pa nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyig so// chen po stong pa nyid sgom pa nya ste chen po stong pa nyid myi dmyigaso
194b2('bum): don dam pa stong pa nyid sgom ste don dam pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus ma
194b3('bum): byas stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom ste mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// thog ma dang tha ma myed pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ thog ma dang myed
194b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid sgo mu ste/ dor ba myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid sgom ste/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// 
194b5('bum): chos thams cad stong pa nyid sgom ste/ chos thams cad/ stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// 
194b6('bum): myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ myi dmyigs pa stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dong sa po myed pa stong pa nyid myi dmyig so// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgo
194b7('bum): ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigs so// dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid myi dmyigaso// dran pa nye bar bzhag pa bzhi sgom ste/ dran pa/ 
194b8('bum): nye bar bzhag pa rnams myi dmyigs so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi sgom ste/ yang dag par spong ba rnaMs myi dmyigaso// rdzu 'phrul gi rkang pa rnams sgom ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnaMs
195a1('bum): myi dmyigs so// dbang po lnga bsgom ste dbang po rnams myi dmyigs so// stobs lnga sgom ste stobs rnams myi dmyigaso/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom ste byang chub kyi yan lnga
195a2('bum): rnams myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyud pa sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa myi dmyigs so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i
195a3('bum): bden pa rnams myi dmyig so// bsam gtan rnams sgom ste bsam gtan rnams myi dmyigs so// tshad myed pa rnams sgom ste tshad myed pa rnams myi dmyigs so// gzugs myed pa'i snyos
195a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sgom ste/ gzugs myed pa'i snyoms nga par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyigs so// rnam par thar pa brgya da sgom ste rnam par thar pa brgyad myi dmyigs so// mthar
195a5('bum): kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu sgom ste mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams myi dmyi// gso/ stong pa nyid sgom ste stong pa nyid myi dmyigaso// mtshan
195a6('bum): ma myed pa sgom ste mtshan ma myed pa myi dmyigs so// smon pa myed pa sgom ste smon pa myed pa myi dmyigs so// mngon par shes pa rnams sgom ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams myi dmyigaso// 
195a7('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste ting nge 'dzin rnams myi dmyigs so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste gzungs kyi sgo rnams myi dmyigs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu sgom sto// de
195a8('bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams myi dmyigs so// myi 'jigs pa bzhi sgom ste/ myi 'jigs pa rnams myi dmyigs so// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi sgom ste/ so so yang dag
195b1('bum): par rig pa rnams myi dmyigs so// byams pa chen po sgom ste/ byams pa chen po myi dmyig so// snying rje chen po sgom ste/ snying rje chen po myi dmyig so// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyang
195b2('bum): sgom ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad myi dmyigaso/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu myo dmyigaso/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgo
195b3('bum): ste/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu myi dmyigs so// phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ phyir myi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mya dmyigaso// dag bcom pa nyid sgom ste/ dgra bcom pa nyid myi dmyigs
195b4('bum): so// rang byang chub sgom ste rang byang chub myi dmyigs so// lam gi rna pa shes pa nyid sgom ste/ lam gi rnam pa shes pa nyi dang myi dmyigaso// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid sgom ste/ 
195b5('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid myi dmyigs so// sha ra dwa/ ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems
195b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams ca kyang yongasu rdzogs par byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par rjes su myi mthong ngo // sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di
195b7('bum): ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ myig lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang / yongs su sbyong ba yod de/ lnga gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste
195b8('bum): 'i myig dang / lha'i myig dang / shes rab kyi myig dang / chos kyi myig dang / sangs rgyas kyi myig go// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig
196a1('bum): yongs su dgu pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do/ 
196a2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i myig gas
196a3('bum): dpag tshad sum brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis dpag tshad bzhi brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems
196a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis dpag tshad lha brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dI ta'i bu byang chub sems da dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis dpag tshad drug/ 
196a5('bum): brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang 'i sems dpa' chen po'i shi'i myig gis dpag tshad ba dun brgya mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i byi byang chub sems
196a6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis dpag tshad brgya de brgya mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i shi'i myig gis dpag tshad dgu brgya mthong ba
196a7('bum): yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bri byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis dpag tshad stong mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shi'i myig
196a8('bum): gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shi'i myig gis gling gnyis mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sas dpa'
196b1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis gling gsum mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod/ 
196b2('bum): sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i rgya
196b3('bum): gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gi khams
196b4('bum): mthong ba yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub seMs da dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i myig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
196b5('bum): dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig yongasu dag pa gang lags/ ba com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin
196b6('bum): pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems da rab tu shes so// sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// mtshe ma'i lha rnas kyi lha'i mya
196b7('bum): gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang
196b8('bum): yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi lcil
197a1('bum): myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs lha nye phan gi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs pa kun 'khor gi/ 
197a2('bum): lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs chen gi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub seMs dpas rab tu shes so// snang ba'i lha rnams
197a3('bum): kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung snang gi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i/ 
197a4('bum): myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// ku na snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de na byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang
197a5('bum): yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung dge'i// lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnaMs kyi lha'i myag
197a6('bum): gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dbus rab tu sheso/ dge rgyas gi lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa sa rab tu shes/ che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa
197a7('bum): de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung che'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad myed che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang
197a8('bum): chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// myi che ba'i lha'i rjes kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub ses
197b1('bum): dpas rab tu shes so// myi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub ses dpas rab
197b2('bum): tushes so// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'og myin gyi lha rnams kyi lnga'i myig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu/ 
197b3('bum): shes so// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnaMs kyis myi shes so// byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lnga'o// 
197b4('bum): myig de ni sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams gis myi shes so/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni mtshe ma'i lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems
197b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni dga' ldan gi lha/ rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni 'phrul dga' lha rnams kyis
197b6('bum): myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myog de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed gi lha rnas kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni tshangs
197b7('bum): ros kyi lha rnams gyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni tshangs lnga nye phan gyi lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
197b8('bum): 'i lha'i myig de ni tshangs pa kun 'khor gi lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni tshangs chen gi lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub sems dang / 
198a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni snang ba'i lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni chung snang gi lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub
198a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni tshad myed snang ba'i lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de na kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams gis myi
198a3('bum): shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni dge ba'i lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig do ni chung dge'i lha rnams gis/ 
198a4('bum): myi shes so// byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lta de'i myig de ni tshad myed dge ba'i lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni dge
198a5('bum): rgyas gi lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni che ba'i lha rnams gis myi shes/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha/ 
198a6('bum): myig de na chung che'i lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni tshad myed sna che ba'i lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lnga/ 
198a7('bum): 'amyig de ni 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni myi che ba'i lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i
198a8('bum): myig de ni myi gdung ba'i lha rnams gis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams gis myi shes so/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/ 
198b1('bum): po'i lha'i myig de ni gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis myi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig de ni 'og myin gyi rnams gis myi shes so// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan tu'i byang chub
198b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang
198b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub
198b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi sems can nu ngas kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan
198b5('bum): pa'i byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gis/ mas can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ lha'i myig/ 
198b6('bum): de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang shar gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes/ 
198b7('bum): so/ lI'i myag de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khas gang ga'i klud kyi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnas kyi 'tsho'i pho dang skye ba
198b8('bum): rab tu shes so// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni lho nub gi phyogs 'tshams gi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi sems can rnams kyi/ 
199a1('bum): 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma
199a2('bum): snyeng gi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i
199a3('bum): klung gi bye ma snyed gi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i myig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams
199a4('bum): gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed gi sems can rnaMs kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba rab tu shes so/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i myig yong su dag pa'o// / 
199a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las// bam po bcu gcig pa / gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ses
199a6('bum): dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi myig yong su dag pa gang lags/ boca ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub seM mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi myig glang nga
199a7('bum): ldan pas 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba 'am myi dge ba 'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i/ kha na ma tho ba myed pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs mi myed
199a8('bum): pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa 'am zag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zag pa myed pa'i chos gang yang myi shes pa myed pa dang / shes rab kyi myig gang dang ldan pas chos gang yang/ 
199b1('bum): ma mthong ba myed pa/ ma thos pa myed pa ma bsams pa myed pa/ khong du ma chud pa myed pa 'di ni/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi myig yongs su dag pa'o// 
199b2('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang
199b3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig gi gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni chos gi rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/ gang
199b4('bum): zag 'di ni dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid gis skye bar 'gyur ro/ dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzi na thob par 'gyur ro/ de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gsi rna
199b5('bum): par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam paragrol ba'i ye shes mthong bus 'jig tshogs la lta ba da nga / the tshom dang tshul khrims dang / rtul shugs snyems
199b6('bum): pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgoms nas lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / ngan sas rab tu srabA/ 
199b7('bum): par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir/ 
199b8('bum): myi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs myed pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang nga rgyal dang / rgod po rab tu spong ste/ gang zag/ 
200a1('bum): 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o// gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma myed pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di ni dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgra mtshan ma myed pas skye bar 'gyuraro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge
200a2('bum): 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang / the tshom dang tshul khris
200a3('bum): dang / brtul shugs snyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgoms pa'i lam rab tu thob nas 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang ngan sems
200a4('bum): rab tu bsrabs par byed de/ gang zag 'od ni len cig phyir 'ong ba'odang / de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'dod pa 'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de gang
200a5('bum): zug 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgo mas pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs mye/ dra pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu/ 
200a6('bum): spong ste/ gang zag 'di ni dag btso pa'o// gang zag 'di ni smon pa myed pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di dbang po lnga ni rnam par thor pa'i sgo smon pa myed pas skye bar 'gyuraro/ dbang po lngas de ma thag
200a7('bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzini thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gos rna bar grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par gol ba'i ye shes mthong bso 'jig chags la lta ba dang / the tshom dang
200a8('bum): tshul khrims dang / brtul shugs snyems pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'odi ni rgyun tu zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgoms pa'i la rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags
200b1('bum): dang / ngan sems rab tu bsrabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod chags dang / ngan sems rab tu spong ba thob par byed de/ 
200b2('bum): gang zag 'di ni phyir myi 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang / gzugs myed pa'i 'dod chags dang / ma rig pa dang nga rgyal dang / rgod pa rab tu spong
200b3('bum): ste/ gang zag 'di ni dag bcom pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig yongs su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
200b4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dzaM yang rung ste/ kun 'a byung ba'i chos can de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can no/ zhes bya bar shes pas dad pa las stsogs pas dbang po lnga thob pA/ 
200b5('bum): 'gyur te/ 'di ni sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub seMs dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig yongs su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi myig
200b6('bum): gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rolod tu phyin pa la spyod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu
200b7('bum): phyin pa la spyod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod do// de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan te/ thabs mkhas
200b8('bum): pos ched du bosams te/ lus yong su 'dzin pa myed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// bram ze'i rigs su skyon
201a1('bum): khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i nang tu skye'o// sum bcu rtsa gsum gi lha'i nang du skye'o// mtshe ma'i lha'i nang tu skye'o// dga' ldan gi lha'i nad tu skye'o
201a2('bum): 'phrul dga' lha'i nang tu skye'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang tu skye'o// de de dag na gnas shing sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la/ 
201a3('bum): rim 'gror byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yong su dag par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par byed de/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag btso pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
201a4('bum): sangs rgyas rnams la yang bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ro// ram 'gr-i dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyi sa la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang myi ltung ngo // 
201a5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na myed pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgya/ sa kyi bar tu phyir ldog par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes
201a6('bum): te/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang byang chub sras dpa' sems dpa' che na po'i chos kyi myig yong su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzha na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang
201a7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o// 'di ni lung ma bstan pa'o// 'di ni nges pa'o// 'di ni ma nges po'i/ 'di na lung stan
201a8('bum): par 'gyur// 'di ni lung bstan par myi 'gyur// 'di dag ni phyir myi ldog pa ste/ dbang po thob pa'o// 'di dag ni phyir myi ldog pa ma yin pa ste/ dbang po ma thob po/ 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yo/ 
201b1('bum): su rdzogs pa'o// 'di dag gi mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni mngon par shes pa rna yongs su rdzogs pas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten
201b2('bum): kyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu
201b3('bum): dud dang / mchod pa byed do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du dong zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ 
201b4('bum): mnyes par byed do/ rim go dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byed do/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du song zhing de bzhin gshegs
201b5('bum): pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam sa mnyes par byed de// rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gi
201b6('bum): khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du song zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu
201b7('bum): dud dang / mchod pa byed do/ byang shar gi phyagos 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du song zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
201b8('bum): sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ rim 'go dang / bkur sI dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams gi 'jig rten gi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag du
202a1('bum): song ning de btsun gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phudud dang / mchod pa byed do// 
202a2('bum): rgya tu phyogs 'arnams kyi 'jig rten ga khams gang ga'i klung gi rje ma snyed dag du so na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnas mtsham
202a3('bum): byed do// rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// nub byung gi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing de bzhin pa / 
202a4('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim 'gro dang / bkur sti dang / phu ru da dang / mchod pa byed do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
202a5('bum): khams gang ga'i klud kyi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing de bzhin ga/ shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sang / sa rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim 'gro dang / bkur
202a6('bum): sti dang / phu dud dang / mchod pa byed do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'a jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
202a7('bum): sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim 'gro dang bkur sti dang phu dud dang mchod pa byed do// 'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'di ni bzod pa thob pa'o 'di ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin
202a8('bum): pa'o// 'di ni dbang po thob pa'o 'di ni dbang po thob pa ma yin pa'i/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yong su dag par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems pa
202b1('bum): chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yong su dag par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon
202b2('bum): lam chen po dang ldan pa'o// 'dis ni sems can yongasu smin par byas so// 'dis ni sems can yongs smin par ma byas so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig
202b3('bum): rten gyi khas gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams legs par brjod par mdzad do// 'di la ni legs pa rjod pa ma mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
202b4('bum): chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang ma/ nye bar gnas par 'gyuraro// 'di dag ni nye bar gnas par myi 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni byang
202b5('bum): chub thob nas tshe dpag tu myed pa thob par 'gyuraro// 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po 'di'i 'od dang / dbyangs dang dge 'aslong gi dge 'dun
202b6('bum): ni tshad myed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe
202b7('bum): chen po'i dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro// 'di ni ldan par myi 'gyur ro// 'di ni dge ba spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di ni spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di ni srid pa tha ma'o/ 'di ni tha ma pa ma yin no// 'di ni snying po byang
202b8('bum): chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'dug par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni bdud yod par 'gyur/ 'di dag la ni yod par myi 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar rab tu shes te de
203a1('bum): ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi myig yongasu dag pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas
203a2('bum): kyi myig yongs su dag pa gang logs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal du pa/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la
203a3('bum): mnyam par bzhag nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed de/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/ temyi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ chos so yang dag par rig pa
203a4('bum): bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgya dad dang ldan pa yin/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa yin
203a5('bum): btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rna bar bsgrubs pa myed pa dang ldan pa yin/ de ni de'i myig ste/ byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po myig dang ldan
203a6('bum): pas/ rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong ba 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ ma shes pa 'am/ khong du ma chud pa gang yang myed de/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na myed pa yang
203a7('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi myig yong su dag pa'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myig lnga yongasu sbyang bya/ 
203a8('bum): 'dod pa dang / thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rtson par bya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha ra lod tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed do// 
203b1('bum): nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa myed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu la la zhig yang dag par smra bas dge ba'i
203b2('bum): chos thams cad 'dus zhes brjod pa zhig tu dgos na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par smra bas brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni myig lnga/ 
203b3('bum): bskyed pa'o// myig lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// sha ra dwa ti'i bu shes/ rab kyi pha rol
203b4('bum): tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rab tu 'thob ste/ de rdzu 'phrul gi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do// 
203b5('bum): de ni sa chen po 'di yang rab tu g.yo bar byed de/ gcig tu gyur cing mang por 'gyur ro// mang por gyur cing gci ga tu 'gyur ro// snang ba dang myi snang ba yang nyams su
203b6('bum): myong bar byed do// rtsig pa las thal ba dang / ra ba las thal ba dang / ri las thal bar thogs pa myed pa'i lus gas 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// nam slong dkyil ma kruH
203b7('bum): gyis 'gro ste/ dper na 'dab chags bya bzhin no/ sa la yang gyen du 'byung ba dang / 'og du 'dzul bar byed de/ dper na chu la bya ba bzhin no// chu la yang 'bying ba myed par 'gro ste/ dper na sa
203b8('bum): la bya ba bzhin no// du bar 'thul zhing mer 'bar te/ dper na me'i phung po chen po bzhin no// nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang lag pas byugs
204a1('bum): shing tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gi bar du lus gis dbang bsgyur te/ rdzu 'phrul des rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang
204a2('bum): rang bzhin gis ma skyes pa'i des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu myi dmyigs te/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam/ rdzu 'phrul mngon
204a3('bum): par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang myi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gA rnam pa mngon du bya
204a4('bum): ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de lha'i rna ba'i khams rnam par dwa ga pi mya las 'das pos myi dang lha gnyis ka'i sgra thos te/ lce'o/ 
204a5('bum): rna ba'i khams des bdag gi sgra snyan ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do// de ni 'di ltar des rang bzhin stong pa/ dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ga ma skyes pa'i phyir rna/ 
204a6('bum): ba dang sgrar dmyigs pa myed de/ de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par lha'i rna ba'i khams la bsam pa tsam yang myi skyed do// de ltar na sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
204a7('bum): seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i rna ba'i khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub po/ des sems can pha rol dang gang zag pa
204a8('bum): rol gi sems sems kyis yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab/ 
204b1('bum): tu shes so// 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems
204b2('bum): shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang bral pa'i sems la zhe sdang dang blan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab du rab shes so// gti mug dang
204b3('bum): ldan pa'i sems la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// gti mug dang bral ba'i sems la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar
204b4('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// sred pa dang lta ngan pa'i sems la sred pa dang ldan pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin tu shes so// sred pa dang bral ba'i ses
204b5('bum): la sred pa dang bral ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta/ ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar len pa dang bca sa pa'i seMs la nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya ba
204b6('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye bar le nad pa myed ba'i sems la nye bar len pa myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// kun nas 'dus
204b7('bum): pa'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rno bar 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa rdzi
204b8('bum): lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// rgya chung ba'i sems la rgya chung ba'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rgya che ba'i sems la rgya che ba'i sems shes bya bar
205a1('bum): yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// yangs pa'i sems la yangs pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshad myed pa'i se rnams la/ 
205a2('bum): tshad myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par bzhag pa'i seM sa la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu/ 
205a3('bum): rab tu shes so// mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems la mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam
205a4('bum): par grol ba'i ye she sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// rna bar grol ba'i sems la// rnam par ma grol ba'i seMs zhes bya bar yang dag
205a5('bum): pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems la zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zag
205a6('bum): pa myed po'i sems la zag pa myed po'i sems shes bya bar yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i
205a7('bum): sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
205a8('bum): shes so// bla na yod pa'i sems la bla na yod pa'i sems shes bya bar yang dag po ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ bla na myed pa'i sems la bla na myed pa'i sems shes bya bar yang
205b1('bum): dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gzhan gi sems shes bya ba des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang myed do// de ni sems de nyid bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de ni bdag nyid gi
205b2('bum): shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gse rlom sems su gyur pa de lta bu'i sems myi
205b3('bum): dmyigs te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par sas shes bya bar bya ba'i bsam pa 'am/ sems shes pa'i mngon par bsgrub pa'i bas pa tsam yang myi skyed do// shar
205b4('bum): dA ti'i byi de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ses dpa' chen po she/ sra rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can thams cad gi sems dang / spyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par
205b5('bum): shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no// de ni sngon gri gnas rjes su dran pa 'am mngon du bya ba'i mngon pa reshe sa pa'i ye shes rnam pa du ma mngon par sgrub ste/ 
205b6('bum): ses gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas sems brgya'i bar tu rjes su dran no// nyi ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas nyi ma brgya tsha'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// zla ba gcig kyang rjes
205b7('bum): dran pa nas zla ba brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// lo gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas lo brgya'i bar du yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas bskal pa rgya
205b8('bum): bar tu yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa brgya phrag du mar yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa stong phrag du mar yang rjes su dran no// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma yang rjes su/ 
206a1('bum): dran no// bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug ste/ mying ni 'di zhes bya rus ni 'di zhes bya/ rigs ni 'di zhes bya/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za za/ yun ni 'di srid cig du 'dug 'dug/ tshe/ 
206a2('bum): 'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig du gyur te/ de ltar bdag de nas shi 'phos nus che go zhig tu skyes so zhes bya bas de dag shi 'phos nas ni 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcus/ gtan
206a3('bum): tshigs dang bcas dun rtags dang bcas par bdag dang bzhin gi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su dran te/ sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes des
206a4('bum): kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do// de ni 'di ltar ye shes di ye shes ma yin te/ bsam gis myi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bya ngas kyang bdag gis rab tu shes so// zhes bya bar rlom
206a5('bum): seMs myed de/ 'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang bzhin dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyi ra gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes
206a6('bum): myi dmyigs so/ de na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi bas pa tsam yang myi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' seMs
206a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sngon gi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de ni lha'i myig rnam par dag pa myi las
206a8('bum): 'das pas sems can shi 'pho dang / skye ba dang kho dog sdug pa dang / kha tog myi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang / ngan song na gnas pa dang / bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu d+he/ 
206b1('bum): te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis ngan tu spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa rnaMs la skur pa 'debs pa log par lta
206b2('bum): ba rnams te/ 'di ni de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis lus shig nas/ ngan song dang ngan 'gro log par ltung ba'i seMs can dmyal ba dag tu skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa
206b3('bum): dang ldan/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yad gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa la 'phags pa la skur ba myi 'debs pa yang drag par lta ba rnams te/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen kyis
206b4('bum): lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho risi go 'jig rten gi lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar phyogs bcu kun gi 'jig rten gi khams chos kyi dbyings kyi
206b5('bum): klas pa/ nam mkha'i ge mthas gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug du gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang shi 'pho yang drag/ pa ji lta ba bzhin tu rab tu shes so// des kyang rlom ses
206b6('bum): su 'gyur ba myed do// de ni 'di ltar myig de myig ma yin zhing bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bye bar rlom sems myed do// de ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / 
206b7('bum): rang bzhini dben pa dang / rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta bu'i myig des myi dmyigs te// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa ma gtogs/ 
206b8('bum): par lha'i myig gis bsam pa 'am lha'i myig mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa yang myi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
207a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / lha'i myig mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub po// de ni zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes
207a2('bum): mngon par bsgrub kyang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas gi sa thob par myi byed do// gang bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang yang myi mthong ngo // 
207a3('bum): de mngon par shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas/ bgra chags kyi 'tshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu spong bar byed de/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mo/ 
207a4('bum): par shes pa des rlom sems su 'gyur ba myed do// de ni 'di ltar ye shes de nyid ye shes ma yin zhing bas gis myi khyab da pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlo// 
207a5('bum): sems myed de/ de yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang / rang / bzhin dben pa dang rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir gang gi sa rlom seMs su 'gyur ba'i zag pa zad pa'i ye shes
207a6('bum): mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa de lta bu myi dmyig so// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par zag pa zad pa'i ye shes kyi bsam pa 'am/ zag pa zad pa mngon tu bya bI/ 
207a7('bum): ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang myi skyed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ zag pa zod// 
207a8('bum): pa'i mngon tu bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa yin no// sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub ses dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod cing
207b1('bum): mngon par shes pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'phel lo// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
207b2('bum): chen po shes rab kyi pha rold tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir chags pa myed pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas rna ba
207b3('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul
207b4('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas zhing / mtha' la das 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir ltung ba myed pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi la mo sbyong ba dag kyang
207b5('bum): yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa 'a seMs dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la/ spyod pa'i tshe/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin po la gnas
207b6('bum): shing mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gi phyir myi 'khrug pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub ses
207b7('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir lus dang
207b8('bum): sems kyi brtson 'grus myi zhig pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shre/ 
208a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bsam gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'khrug pa myed pa'i sems nye bar bzung bas rna/ 
208a2('bum): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi
208a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab 'chal pa'i sems myi dmyigs pa nye bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ga lim sbyong ba dag kyang
208a4('bum): yod do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ pha rol tu phyin pa la drug la spyoganas shing / mtha' las
208a5('bum): 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir 'ong ba myed pa dang 'gro ba myed pa nye bar/ bzung ba dang yongs su 'dzin pa myed pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa thas cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba yin no// de la
208a6('bum): sbyin pa ni yongs su 'dzin pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// tshul khrims ni tshul khrims ngan pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// bzod pa ni 'khrug pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// 
208a7('bum): brtson 'grus ni le lo nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// ting nge 'dzin ni mnyam par ma bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags so// shes rab ni shes rab 'chal pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags// 
208a8('bum): de ni rgal to zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// ma rgald to zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// sbyin pa byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// sbyin pa myi byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// tshul
208b1('bum): khrims dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// tshul khrims ngan pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// khro ba can no zhes bya bar
208b2('bum): rlom sems myed do// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// le lo can no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// mnyam par bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom ses myed do// mnyam par ma
208b3('bum): bzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// shes rab dang ldan no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// shes rab 'chal pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// spros so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// 
208b4('bum): phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// rim 'gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom seMs myed do// rim 'gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sem sa myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sha ra dwa ti'i bu ma skyes
208b5('bum): pa ni spyos so zhes bya bar rlom sems myed do// phyag byas so zhes/ bya bar rlom sems myed do// rim 'gro byas so zhes bya bar rlo mi sems myed do// rim 'gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom
208b6('bum): sems myed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni rlom sems thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir te/ 'di la sha ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' se/ 
208b7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ yon tan ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thas cad ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la myed do// de dag yon tan 'di dag yod// 
208b8('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams yongasu smin par byed pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yong su dag par byed/ rnam pa thams
209a1('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par byed do// sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams
209a2('bum): cad la snyoms pa'i sems bskyed de/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems bskyed nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu 'thob bo/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob nas/ chos thos
209a3('bum): cad mnyam pa nyid la sems can thams cad rab tu 'god do// de ni tshe 'di nyid la yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su byon cing / dben par bya ba ma yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' thams
209a4('bum): cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing dben par bya ba yini/ de ni skye ba gang dang gang tu skyes shing kyang de dang dang gra tu nam yang myig gis yid du myi 'ong ba'i gzugs myi mthong ngo // 
209a5('bum): rna bas yid du myi 'ong ba'i sgra myi thos so// snas yid du myi 'ong ba 'i dri myi tshor ro// lces yid du myi 'ong ba'i ri myi myong ngo // lu/ sa kyis yid du myi 'ong ba'i reg bya myi reg go// yid du myi 'ong ba'i
209a6('bum): chos rnam par rig pa myed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi ni pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
209a7('bum): byang chub las yongs su nyams par myi 'gyur ro/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di ston pa'i tshe/ dge slong sum brgya gos gyon gyon pa/ bcom ldan 'das la yon tu gsol te/ bla na myed
209a8('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa
209b1('bum): gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
209b2('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa myi badzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol
209b3('bum): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag ni bskal pa drug bcu rtsa gcig 'das nas/ bskal pa dpe'
209b4('bum): skar ma lta bu la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang da dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal chen po zhes bya ba shA stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // de dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ 
209b5('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'a sangs rgyas myi bskul ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye'o// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag drug bcus kyang bla na
209b6('bum): myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid
209b7('bum): du rab tu byung nas tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa des kyang de dag bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'gyur// de nas sangs rgyas
209b8('bum): kyi mthus de'i tshe 'khor bzhi po de dag 'di na 'khod bzhin du shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong ma
210a1('bum): bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong
210a2('bum): bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// 
210a3('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba gang ji lta bur mthong ba'i/ sangs rgyas
210a4('bum): kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba de dag ni myi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na yod par ma mthong ngo // de nas 'khor de'i ning nas srog chags stong phrag drug bcus bdag cag gis las gang byas pa/ 
210a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag du skye bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i las spyad pa/ ra bya'o zhes smon lam btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'a/ ngas kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bas pa thugs su chud nas zhal
210a6('bum): 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs tebla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa 'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba de logs
210a7('bum): su thal mo sbyar ba btud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad par myi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen kyis/ 
210a8('bum): zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsald pa/ dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag mthong ngam/ gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mthong ngo // 
210b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni 'di nas shi 'phos nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/ 
210b2('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang nam du yang myi 'bral te/ phyi ma'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyan kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba sha stag
210b3('bum): 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa me'u 'gal gi bu chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor dang / tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po dang / chu dang
210b4('bum): ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang / dge slong gzhan dag kyang kun gis de mngon par shes pa shin tu mang ba dag dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu mang ba dag dang / dge slong
210b5('bum): pha dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen pa dang / dge bsnyen mu shin/ tu mang ba dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ce/ sa gsol to// bco ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol
210b6('bum): tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' ses
210b7('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnas kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dam 'o/ 
210b8('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyin pa rab po// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi
211a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rold tu phyin pa phul lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di
211a2('bum): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog go// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang / 
211a3('bum): chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gya nom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
211a4('bum): bzang po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha ro/ ral tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa'o// bcom
211a5('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/ pha rold tu phyin pa ltag na ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan
211a6('bum): 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' seMs dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi// 
211a7('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
211a8('bum): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dra ba ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub seMs dpa' sems
211b1('bum): dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ang byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol
211b2('bum): tu phyin pa nam mkha' 'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid/ 
211b3('bum): do// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos thams cad stong pa nyid do// bcom
211b4('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du tu phyin pa dngos po myed pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do// 
211b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste gos rab kyi pha rol tu dz+nyAn/ 'dzin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad yong/ 
211b6('bum): rdzogs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi sa ro lad tu phyin pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe ba chen po rnams kyi pha mong tu phyin pa yon tan thams cad
211b7('bum): dang ldan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thub pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom
211b8('bum): ldan 'das 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyind pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa yongs su btang ngo // yongs
212a1('bum): btang ngo // yongs su gtong bar 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa yong su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongasu rdzogs
212a2('bum): par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob po// 'thob par 'gyur ro// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par
212a3('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to/ 'thob po/ 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nA
212a4('bum): kyis ni/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshul khrims bsrungs srung ngo / srung bar 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa de/ nying mnyam pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu
212a5('bum): rdzogs par gyur to/ yong su rdzogs so// yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i srad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob bor gyur to/ 'thob po// 'thob par 'gyur/ 
212a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa bsgoms so// sgom mo sgom/ 
212a7('bum): par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyem po dang mnyam pa'i bzod pa'i phyi ro lang tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i sra
212a8('bum): du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mya mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag pa'o/ 
212b1('bum): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
212b2('bum): bri rnams kyis ni/ myo mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i brtson 'grus brtsams so// mom mo// tsam par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myo mnyam pa dang mnyam po'i brtson 'grus kyi cha lang tu phyin
212b3('bum): yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du mya mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// 'thob par 'gyur ro// 
212b4('bum): de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla/ na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyu rang to// 'thob po// 'thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan
212b5('bum): 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byangachub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bas gtan bskyed do// skyed do// 
212b6('bum): bskyed par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur ro// 
212b7('bum): smad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob po// 'thob par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa/ 
212b8('bum): 'i byang chub tu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen rnams kyi/ 
213a1('bum): ni myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms so// sgom mo// sgom par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
213a2('bum): yongs su rdzogs par gyur to// yongs su rdzogs so// yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de'i slad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i lus thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ 'a thob par 'gyur ro// 
213a3('bum): de'i srad du myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i chos 'di lta ste/ bla na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol dutu
213a4('bum): phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pa myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ka/ thugs thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur te/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du shes thob pa
213a5('bum): gyur to// myi mnyam po dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob bAr/ gyu ra to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par zhes pa/ thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnya pa'i byang chub tu mngon
213a6('bum): byung nusaste/ myi mnyam pa dang sa kyi skyer byo gyu // 'das pa'i sangs rgyas ldan ngas rnams kyis kyang zhes rab gyi rom rgyun
213a7('bum): snad pas kyi mnyam pa dang rgya pa'i gzus pa gyus// rgyas rnam pa dang rnas ra shi byur gyur / sa pa nga rgyam pa'i 'dugs sob pa b+h+yo / 
213a8('bum): mya minyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to// ma byon po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang shes rab/ 
213b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas/ myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i
213b2('bum): 'du shes thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i 'du byed thob par gyurd to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i rnam par shes pa thob par gyur to// da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bco
213b3('bum): ldan 'das rnams kyis kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la spyad pas myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i gzugs thob par gyur to// myi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i tshor ba thob par gyur
